72.zh-Hans:

27330.en: <voice 00025_00027330><start_lip_sync n00225 _normal m00001>Yesss, that's a good answer. Good luck!<stop_lip_animation n00225 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27330.zh-Hant: <voice 00025_00027330><start_lip_sync n00225 _normal m00001>不錯！回答得很好。祝你好運！<stop_lip_animation n00225 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27331.ja: <voice 00151_00027331><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「あっ　<pc>さま！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27331.ko: <voice 00151_00027331><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 앗, <pc> 님!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74.en:
<voice 00252_00000074><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>What should I do...? I've studied so hard, but I'm nervous
so I won't remember anything.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74.ja:
<voice 00252_00000074><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「どうしよう……。
　あんなに　勉強したのに
　ドキドキして　全然　思いだせないの。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74.ko:
<voice 00252_00000074><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 어쩌죠…….
　그렇게 열심히 공부했는데
　두근거려서 하나도 기억이 안 나요.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74.zh-Hans:
<voice 00252_00000074><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>怎么办啊……
明明那么刻苦地学习，
现在却因为太紧张，什么都想不起来。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74.zh-Hant:
<voice 00252_00000074><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>怎麼辦……
我明明那麼努力用功，
現在卻緊張到完全想不起來。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

76.en:
<voice 00280_00000076><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>A blazing arrow fell from the sky. All of the roofs burned....
Was that the saying?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
76.ja:
<voice 00280_00000076><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「東の空から　火の矢が落ちた。
　燃え落ちるは　青い屋根　赤い屋根……
　って　なんの引用だっけ？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
76.ko:
<voice 00280_00000076><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 동쪽 하늘에서 불화살이 떨어졌다.
　불에 타서 부서지는 파란 지붕, 빨간 지붕……
　이게 어디서 인용된 거였죠?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
76.zh-Hans:
<voice 00280_00000076><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>东方的天空落下无数火矢。
燃烧着蓝色的屋顶、红色的屋顶……
这句是出自哪里？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
76.zh-Hant:
<voice 00280_00000076><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>從東方天空落下無數火矢，
燃燒著藍色、紅色的屋頂……
呃，這段話是出自哪裡啊？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

78.en: <voice 00385_00000078><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Oh no, it's Professor Izuyanoi...!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

78.ko: <voice 00385_00000078><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 윽, 이즈야노이 선생님……!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
78.zh-Hans: <voice 00385_00000078><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>唔。泉屋野依老师！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
78.zh-Hant: <voice 00385_00000078><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>嗚，泉屋野依老師……！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

80.en: <voice 00490_00000080><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>At last, this day has come.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
80.ja: <voice 00490_00000080><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「いよいよ　この日が来たな。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
80.ko: <voice 00490_00000080><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 드디어 오늘이 왔군.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
80.zh-Hans: <voice 00490_00000080><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>这一天终于到了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001427.en: <voice 00510_19001427><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>This year, the ones attempting the trial will be our two geniuses, <pc> and Asanagi.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001427.ja:
<voice 00510_19001427><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「今年の　若葉の試みには
　天才である　<pc>と　
　秀才アサナギが挑む。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001427.ko:
<voice 00510_19001427><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 올해 새싹 시험에는
　천재 {pc}|hpp(과,와) 
　수재 아사나기가 도전한다.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001427.zh-Hans:
<voice 00510_19001427><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>今年的新叶试炼，
有天才<pc>和逸才朝薙参与挑战。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001427.zh-Hant:
<voice 00510_19001427><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>今年的新葉測驗
有天才<pc>和逸才麻薙參與挑戰。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

83.en:
<voice 00530_00000083><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>For the first time since the founding of the Garden
of Learning, multiple candidates have advanced,
everyone is looking forward to it!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
83.ja:
<voice 00530_00000083><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「この学びの庭の　創設以来
　はじめて　複数の合格者が出るのではないかと
　皆　楽しみにしているぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
83.ko:
<voice 00530_00000083><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 이 배움의 뜰이 창설된 이래
　처음으로 합격자가 여럿 나오는 게 아니냐고
　다들 기대하고 있어!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
83.zh-Hans:
<voice 00530_00000083><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>大家都很想知道这次会不会
破学识之庭创建以来的记录，
出现多名合格者呢。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
83.zh-Hant:
<voice 00530_00000083><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>大家都很期待，
認為這次學識之庭很可能出現多位合格者，
這是自創設後從未有過的事！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

84.en: <voice 00620_00000084><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>Well... Looks like everyone's here.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
84.ja: <voice 00620_00000084><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「さて……　全員　そろったようだな。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
84.ko: <voice 00620_00000084><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 자…… 모두 모인 모양이군.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
84.zh-Hans: <voice 00620_00000084><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>那么……所有人都准备好了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
84.zh-Hant: <voice 00620_00000084><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>那麼……所有人都準備好了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

85.en: <voice 00660_00000085><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>Alright, gather round!!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
85.ja: <voice 00660_00000085><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「よし。集まれ！！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
85.ko: <voice 00660_00000085><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 좋아. 모두 집합!!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

86.en:
<voice 00855_00000086><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>Students of the Garden of Learning. You've worked so hard
for this day!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
86.ja:
<voice 00855_00000086><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「我が庭の　学びの徒たちよ。
　よくぞ　これまで修練に　はげみ
　がんばってきた！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
86.ko:
<voice 00855_00000086><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 우리 뜰의 학생들이여.
　그동안 수련에 힘쓰며
　열심히 노력했구나!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
86.zh-Hans:
<voice 00855_00000086><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>学识之庭的学生们啊。
至今为止你们从未怠慢修炼，
值得称赞！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
86.zh-Hant:
<voice 00855_00000086><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>學識之庭的學生們啊。
至今為止你們從未怠慢修煉，
值得稱讚！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87.en:
<voice 00885_00000087><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>After this meeting, you all will undergo the Trial
of New Leaves!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87.ja:
<voice 00885_00000087><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「ここに集いし　お前たちは
　これより　若葉の試みを受けることとなる！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87.ko:
<voice 00885_00000087><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 이곳에 모인 너희들은
　지금부터 새싹 시험을 치르게 될 것이다!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87.zh-Hans:
<voice 00885_00000087><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>你们聚集在这里，
将要接受接下来的新叶试炼！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87.zh-Hant:
<voice 00885_00000087><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>你們聚集在這裡，
將要接受接下來的新葉測驗！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

88.en:
<voice 00945_00000088><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>The Trial of New Leaves is a final
exam that's been handed down here
since time immemorial. It is a trial of both knowledge
... And strength.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
88.ja:
<voice 00945_00000088><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「若葉の試みとは　古くより
　この学びの庭に伝わる　最終試験。
　おのれの知識と　チカラを示す試練だ。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
88.ko:
<voice 00945_00000088><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 새싹 시험은 예로부터
　이 배움의 뜰에 전해 내려오는 최종 시험.
　너희의 지식과 힘을 증명하는 시련이다.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
88.zh-Hans:
<voice 00945_00000088><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>新叶试炼是自古以来
流传在我们学识之庭的最终考试。
是展示自身所学知识与力量的试炼。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
88.zh-Hant:
<voice 00945_00000088><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>新葉測驗是自古以來，
流傳在我們學識之庭的最終試驗。
那是展示自身所學知識與力量的考驗。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

89.en:
<voice 00975_00000089><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>The trial of knowledge is first examination, and the
trial of strength, the second...<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
89.ja:
<voice 00975_00000089><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「知を試す　一次試験と
　チカラを試す　二次試験……。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
89.ko:
<voice 00975_00000089><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 지식을 시험하는 1차 시험과
　힘을 시험하는 2차 시험…….<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
89.zh-Hans:
<voice 00975_00000089><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>试炼分为考验知识的第一轮试炼和
考验力量的第二轮试炼……<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
89.zh-Hant:
<voice 00975_00000089><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>考驗分為了解知識的第一輪考驗，
還有考驗力量的第二輪考驗……<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

90.en:
<voice 01005_00000090><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>Those who pass both shall receive a Mark of Adulthood
and graduate from the Garden of Learning.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
90.ja:
<voice 01005_00000090><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「この双方に合格した者には
　一人前の証が授けられ
　学びの庭を　卒業となる。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
90.ko:
<voice 01005_00000090><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 이 두 시험에 합격한 학생은
　모험가의 증표를 받고
　배움의 뜰을 졸업하게 된다.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
90.zh-Hans:
<voice 01005_00000090><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>两项试炼都合格了的人，
就能获得合格者的证明，
从学识之庭毕业。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
90.zh-Hant:
<voice 01005_00000090><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>兩項考驗都合格了的人
就能獲得合格者之證，
並從學識之庭畢業。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

91.en:
<voice 01085_00000091><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>However, regrettably, those who have failed shall
train to retake the exam next year!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
91.ja:
<voice 01085_00000091><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「だが　残念ながら
　若葉の試みに　不合格だった者は
　また１年　修練の　やり直しだ！ <stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
91.ko:
<voice 01085_00000091><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 그러나 안타깝게도
　새싹 시험에 합격하지 못한 학생은
　1년 더 수련을 쌓아야 한다!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
91.zh-Hans:
<voice 01085_00000091><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>但遗憾的是，
没有通过新叶试炼的人
还要再重新修行一年！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
91.zh-Hant:
<voice 01085_00000091><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>不過遺憾的是，
沒有通過新葉測驗的人，
還要再重新修行一年！ <stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

93.en: <voice 01215_00000093><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>...So, without further ado, let us begin the first trial!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
93.ja:
<voice 01215_00000093><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「……さて。前置きは　これくらいにして
　これより　一次試験を始めよう！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
93.ko:
<voice 01215_00000093><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: ……자, 설명은 이쯤 해 두고
　지금부터 1차 시험을 시작하겠다!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
93.zh-Hans:
<voice 01215_00000093><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>……好了，要交代的就这么多。
现在开始第一轮考试！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
93.zh-Hant:
<voice 01215_00000093><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>……好了，要交代的就是這些，
現在開始第一輪考試！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

94.en:
<voice 01245_00000094><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>You all shall exit Tsusukul Village, and go to the
Shrine of Wisdom. There, in the assembly hall, is the
trial of wisdom.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
94.ja:
<voice 01245_00000094><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「お前たちには　このツスクルの村を出て
　知恵の社へ　行ってもらう。
　そこが　知の試練の会場である。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
94.ko:
<voice 01245_00000094><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 너희들은 이 투스쿠르 마을을 떠나
　지혜의 사당으로 가거라.
　그곳이 지식의 시련을 치를 장소다.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
94.zh-Hans:
<voice 01245_00000094><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>你们走出津洲久留村，
前往智慧神社吧。
那里便是智慧试炼考场。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
94.zh-Hant:
<voice 01245_00000094><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>你們就離開津洲久留村，
前往智慧之殿吧。
那裡是智慧考驗的考場。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9197.en:
<voice 01355_00009197><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>Exit the village from the west, and if you follow the
roads, you shall find your way there.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9197.ja:
<voice 01355_00009197><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「この村の　西にある出口から　外へ出て
　道なりに行けば　たどり着けるだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9197.ko:
<voice 01355_00009197><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 이 마을 서쪽의 출구를 통해 나간 후
　길을 따라서 가면 도착할 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9197.zh-Hans:
<voice 01355_00009197><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>从这个村子的西口出去，
沿着道路走下去就能到了。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9197.zh-Hant:
<voice 01355_00009197><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>從這個村子的西口出去，
順著路走下去應該就會到吧。<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

95.en:
<voice 01385_00000095><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>Outside the village, there are monsters. Traveling
to the Shrine of Wisdom is a trial in and of itself
that has been given to you all!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
95.ja:
<voice 01385_00000095><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「村の外には　魔物がいるからな。
　知恵の社へ向かうことも　また
　お前たちに与えられた　ひとつの試練である！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
95.ko:
<voice 01385_00000095><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 마을 밖에는 마물이 있지.
　지혜의 사당으로 가는 과정 또한
　너희에게 주어진 하나의 시련인 셈이다!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
95.zh-Hans:
<voice 01385_00000095><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>村子外面有很多怪物。
前往智慧神社对于
你们来说同样也是一项考验！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
95.zh-Hant:
<voice 01385_00000095><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>村子外面有很多怪物。
對於你們來說，
前往智慧之殿同樣也是一種考驗！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27338.en:
<voice 01465_00027338><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>Now, learners! Let's see everything you've learned
in this Garden!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27338.ja:
<voice 01465_00027338><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「さあ　学びの徒よ！
　この庭で　学んできた　すべてを
　見せてもらおう！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27338.ko:
<voice 01465_00027338><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 자, 제자들이여!
　이 뜰에서 배운 모든 것을
　보여 봐라!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27338.zh-Hans:
<voice 01465_00027338><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>学生们！
将你们在这里学到的一切
全都展示出来吧！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27338.zh-Hant:
<voice 01465_00027338><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>學生們！
將你們在這裡學到的一切
全都展示出來吧！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

96.en: <voice 01500_00000096><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>Go! The trial has now begun!!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
96.ja: <voice 01500_00000096><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>「行け！　試験は　今　始まったのだ！！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
96.ko: <voice 01500_00000096><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>: 출발! 시험은 지금부터 시작이다!!<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
96.zh-Hans: <voice 01500_00000096><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>出发吧！现在考试正式开始！！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>
96.zh-Hant: <voice 01500_00000096><start_lip_sync n00215 _normal m00001>去吧！現在考驗正式開始！！<stop_lip_animation n00215 CLOSE_MOUTH>

97.en:
<voice 00190_00000097><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>Hmm. Very good, very good. That was
a perfect answer, Asanagi. It seems you've
learned much in your studies.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
97.ja:
<voice 00190_00000097><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「ふむ。けっこう　けっこう。
　アサナギよ　カンペキな答えじゃったぞい。
　学びの庭で　しっかり学んできたようじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
97.ko:
<voice 00190_00000097><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 흐음, 아주 좋아.
　아사나기, 완벽한 대답이구나.
　배움의 뜰에서 제대로 배워 온 모양이야.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
97.zh-Hans:
<voice 00190_00000097><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>嗯。不错，不错。
朝薙啊，答得很完美。
在学识之庭学得不错啊。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
97.zh-Hant:
<voice 00190_00000097><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>嗯，很好、很好。
麻薙，回答得很完美。
在學識之庭學得不錯啊。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

98.en:
<voice 00220_00000098><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>Your trial of knowledge is now over.
You may return to the Garden.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
98.ja:
<voice 00220_00000098><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「これで　お前さんの知の試練は　終わりじゃ。
　学びの庭へ　戻りなさい。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
98.ko:
<voice 00220_00000098><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 이로써 네 지식의 시련은 끝이다.
　배움의 뜰로 돌아가거라.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
98.zh-Hans:
<voice 00220_00000098><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>你的智慧试炼结束了。
回学识之庭去吧。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
98.zh-Hant:
<voice 00220_00000098><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>你的智慧考驗結束了，
回學識之庭去吧。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

99.en: <voice 00296_00000099><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>Thank you very much.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
99.ja: <voice 00296_00000099><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「ありがとうございました。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
99.zh-Hans: <voice 00296_00000099><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>非常感谢。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
99.zh-Hant: <voice 00296_00000099><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>謝謝各位。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

100.en: <voice 00551_00000100><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>So, who will take the trial of knowledge next?<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
100.ja:
<voice 00551_00000100><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「それでは　次…… 
　誰が　知の試練を受けるのじゃ？<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
100.ko:
<voice 00551_00000100><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 그럼 다음은…… 
　누가 지식의 시련을 받을 거지?<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
100.zh-Hans:
<voice 00551_00000100><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>那么接下来……
由谁来接受智慧试炼呢？<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
100.zh-Hant:
<voice 00551_00000100><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>那麼接下來……
由誰來接受智慧考驗呢？<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

102.en: <voice 00806_00000102><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>Oh, if it isn't <pc>. Don't just stand there, come on over.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
102.ja:
<voice 00806_00000102><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>ではないか。
　そんな所に　突っ立っておらんと
　こっちへ来い。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
102.ko:
<voice 00806_00000102><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc> 아니냐.
　그런 데 멀뚱히 서 있지 말고
　이리 오거라.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
102.zh-Hans:
<voice 00806_00000102><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>哦哦，这不是<pc>吗。
不要傻站在那里，
快到我这里来。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
102.zh-Hant:
<voice 00806_00000102><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>喔喔，這不是<pc>嗎？
不要傻站在那裡，
快到我這裡來。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

103.en: <voice 00931_00000103><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001><pc>. You and I have spent many a night talking here.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
103.ja:
<voice 00931_00000103><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。
　お前さんとは　いく晩も
　ここで　語り明かしたのう。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
103.ko:
<voice 00931_00000103><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　너와는 이곳에서 문답을 주고받으며
　수없이 밤을 지새웠지.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
103.zh-Hans:
<voice 00931_00000103><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001><pc>啊。
咱们不知在这里
秉烛夜谈过多少次了。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
103.zh-Hant:
<voice 00931_00000103><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001><pc>啊。
我們不知在這裡
秉燭夜談過多少次了。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

104.en: <voice 00961_00000104><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>I know that your intellect far exceeds the need of this trial.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
104.ja:
<voice 00961_00000104><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「そなたの知識のほど
　知の試練で　試すまでもないことは
　わしが　よう知っておる。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
104.ko:
<voice 00961_00000104><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 네 지식의 깊이는
　지식의 시련으로 시험할 필요도
　없다는 건 잘 안다.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
104.zh-Hans:
<voice 00961_00000104><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>即使不靠智慧试炼，
我也很清楚
你的学识。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
104.zh-Hant:
<voice 00961_00000104><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>即使不靠智慧考驗，
我也很清楚
你的學識。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

105.en:
<voice 01021_00000105><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>How about it, <pc>? With your skill, you're sure to
pass. This is your last chance. Please answer this question.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
105.ja:
<voice 01021_00000105><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「<pc>。
　お前さんのチカラなら　卒業は確実。
　最後の機会じゃ。わしの問いに答えておくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
105.ko:
<voice 01021_00000105><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　네 능력이라면 졸업은 따놓은 당상.
　마지막 기회이니 내 질문에 대답해 보거라.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
105.zh-Hans:
<voice 01021_00000105><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001><pc>，
毕业对于你这样的人来说轻而易举吧。
这也是最后的机会了。回答我的几个问题吧。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
105.zh-Hant:
<voice 01021_00000105><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001><pc>。
以你的實力，畢業是毫無疑問。
這是最後的機會了，回答我幾個問題吧。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

106.en: <voice 01051_00000106><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>All right, let's begin...<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
106.ja: <voice 01051_00000106><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「では　いくぞ……。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
106.ko: <voice 01051_00000106><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 그럼 시작하마…….<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
106.zh-Hans: <voice 01051_00000106><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>那么，开始了……<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
106.zh-Hant: <voice 01051_00000106><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>那麼，開始了……<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

107.en:
<voice 01151_00000107><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>It is said that our fate as Elves is
to live and die alongside Yggdrasil,
the world tree. Is this true?<yesno><close><yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
107.ja:
<voice 01151_00000107><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「我らエルフは　世界樹と　ともに生き
　ともに滅びる運命だという。
　これは　真実であろうか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
107.ko:
<voice 01151_00000107><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 우리 엘프는 세계수와 함께 살고
　함께 멸망할 운명이라고들 하지.
　이것은 참인가?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
107.zh-Hans:
<voice 01151_00000107><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>跟世界树一同生长一同灭亡
是我们埃尔夫的命运。
这是真的吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
107.zh-Hant:
<voice 01151_00000107><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>跟世界樹一同生長一同滅亡
是我們艾爾芙的命運。
這是真的嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

108.en: <voice 01201_00000108><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>Hmm...I see. Then, the next question.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
108.ja:
<voice 01201_00000108><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「ふむふむ……　なるほど。
　では　次。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
108.ko:
<voice 01201_00000108><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 흠흠…… 그렇단 말이지.
　그럼 다음 질문.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
108.zh-Hans:
<voice 01201_00000108><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>嗯嗯……原来如此。
那么，下一问。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
108.zh-Hant:
<voice 01201_00000108><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>嗯嗯……原來如此。
那麼，下個問題。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

109.en:
<voice 01231_00000109><start_lip_syncn00251 _normal m00001>In the distant past...  It's said
that two suns once rose in the sky.
Is this true?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
109.ja:
<voice 01231_00000109><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「遠い昔……　空には
　ふたつの太陽が　のぼっていたという。
　これは　真実であろうか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
109.ko:
<voice 01231_00000109><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 먼 옛날…… 하늘에는
　두 개의 태양이 있었다고 전해지지.
　이것은 참인가?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
109.zh-Hans:
<voice 01231_00000109><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>很久很久以前……天空中
曾经有两个太阳。
这是真的吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
109.zh-Hant:
<voice 01231_00000109><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>據說在很久以前……
天上曾經有兩個太陽。
這是真的嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

110.en: <voice 01276_00000110><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>Hmm...I see. Then, the next question.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
110.ja:
<voice 01276_00000110><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「ふむふむ……　なるほど。
　では　最後じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
110.ko:
<voice 01276_00000110><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 흠흠…… 그렇단 말이지.
　그럼 마지막 질문이다.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
110.zh-Hans:
<voice 01276_00000110><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>嗯嗯……原来如此。
那么，最后一问。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
110.zh-Hant:
<voice 01276_00000110><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>嗯嗯……原來如此。
那麼，最後一個問題。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

111.en:
<voice 01306_00000111><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>The River of Light near this Shrine
of Wisdom is said to be both evil
and holy. Do you think it's holy?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
111.ja:
<voice 01306_00000111><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「この知恵の社から見える　光の河……
　聖なるものとも悪しきものとも　言われておる。
　<pc>は　聖なるものと思うかの？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
111.ko:
<voice 01306_00000111><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 이 지혜의 사당에서 보이는 빛의 강은
　성스러운 것이라고도, 악한 것이라고도 하지.
　<pc>, 너는 성스럽다고 생각하느냐?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
111.zh-Hans:
<voice 01306_00000111><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>从这智慧神社能看到的光之河……
有人说是神圣的，有人说是邪恶的。
<pc>，你认为它是神圣的吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
111.zh-Hant:
<voice 01306_00000111><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>從這智慧之殿能看到的光河……
有人說是神聖的，有人說是邪惡的。
<pc>，你認為它是神聖的嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

112.ko: <voice 01371_00000112><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 그렇단 말이지…….<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
112.zh-Hant: <voice 01371_00000112><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>原來如此……<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

113.en:
<voice 01441_00000113><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>I'm so glad! I've never
been this happy before!<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
113.ja:
<voice 01441_00000113><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「いやあ　よかった！
　こんなに　めでたいことはない！<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
113.ko:
<voice 01441_00000113><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 이야, 다행이야!
　이렇게 기쁠 데가 있나!<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
113.zh-Hans:
<voice 01441_00000113><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>啊，太好了！
没有比这更值得恭喜的了！<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
113.zh-Hant:
<voice 01441_00000113><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>哎呀，太好了！
沒有比這更值得恭喜的了！<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

114.en:
<voice 01471_00000114><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>We've had heated debates over these matters for a long time now
<pc>, but to think that in the end, your opinions would be
exactly the same as mine!<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
114.ja:
<voice 01471_00000114><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「<pc>とは　長い間　ずっと議論を
　戦わせてきたが　最後の最後で
　わしと　まったく同じ意見になるとはのう！<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
114.ko:
<voice 01471_00000114><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 너와는 오랜 세월 줄기차게
　논쟁을 벌였다만 끝에 와서는
　나와 의견이 완벽하게 일치했구나!<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
114.zh-Hans:
<voice 01471_00000114><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>虽然多年来我和<pc>你总因为
不同的见解而争论不休，但没想到
在最后的最后，我们的意见竟会统一！<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
114.zh-Hant:
<voice 01471_00000114><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>雖然多年來我和<pc>你
總因為不同的見解而爭論不休，
但沒想到在最後的最後竟會持相同意見！<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

115.en:
<voice 01501_00000115><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>What a load off my chest! I've finally come to a consensus
with you. That's very reassuring.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
115.ja:
<voice 01501_00000115><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「これで　胸のつかえも下りた！
　<pc>と　意見がひとつになったのじゃ。
　これほど　心強いことはない。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
115.ko:
<voice 01501_00000115><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 이걸로 나도 마음의 짐을 덜었다!
　<pc>, 너와 의견이 일치했으니 말이다.
　이렇게 마음이 든든할 수가 없구나.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
115.zh-Hans:
<voice 01501_00000115><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>这下我也放心了！
能和<pc>的意见一致，
没有比这更令人安心的了。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
115.zh-Hant:
<voice 01501_00000115><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>這下我也放心了！
能和<pc>的意見一致，
沒有比這更令人安心的了。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

116.en:
<voice 01531_00000116><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>Hey, <pc>! Once you've
got your Mark of Adulthood,  let's drink together!<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
116.ja:
<voice 01531_00000116><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。
　一人前となった　あかつきには
　ともに　飲み明かそうぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
116.ko:
<voice 01531_00000116><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　네가 어엿한 엘프가 되면
　그때는 밤새도록 술잔을 나누자꾸나!<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
116.zh-Hans:
<voice 01531_00000116><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
当你能够独当一面的那天来临之际，
咱们就痛快地喝到天亮吧！<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
116.zh-Hant:
<voice 01531_00000116><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
當你能獨當一面的那天來臨之際，
我們就痛快地喝到天亮吧！<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

117.en: <voice 01597_00000117><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>Oops.  What am I saying, we're still  in the middle of the trial.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
117.ja: <voice 01597_00000117><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「おっと……　今は　知の試練の最中じゃったな。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
117.ko:
<voice 01597_00000117><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 어이쿠…… 지금은 아직
　지식의 시련을 치르는 중이었지.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
117.zh-Hans: <voice 01597_00000117><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>哦……现在还在进行智慧试炼呢。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
117.zh-Hant: <voice 01597_00000117><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>啊……現在還在進行智慧考驗呢。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

118.en:
<voice 01656_00000118><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>Well then,
<pc>.The trial is now over.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
118.ja:
<voice 01656_00000118><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「では　<pc>よ。
　お前さんの　知の試練は終わりじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
118.ko:
<voice 01656_00000118><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　네 지식의 시련은 이걸로 끝이다.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
118.zh-Hans:
<voice 01656_00000118><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>那么<pc>啊，
你的智慧试炼结束了。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
118.zh-Hant:
<voice 01656_00000118><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>那麼<pc>啊，
你的智慧考驗結束了。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

119.en:
<voice 01686_00000119><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>Return to the Garden of Learning
in Tsusukul Village and report back
to Izuyanoi that you've passed.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
119.ja:
<voice 01686_00000119><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>「ツスクルの村の　学びの庭に戻るがよい。 
　そして　知の試練を終えたことを
　イズヤノイ先生に　報告するのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
119.ko:
<voice 01686_00000119><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>: 투스쿠르 마을의 배움의 뜰로 돌아가거라.
　그리고 지식의 시련을 마쳤다고
　이즈야노이 선생님께 보고하거라.<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
119.zh-Hans:
<voice 01686_00000119><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>回津洲久留村的学识之庭去，
将通过智慧试炼的好消息
带给泉屋野依老师吧。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>
119.zh-Hant:
<voice 01686_00000119><start_lip_sync n00251 _normal m00001>回津洲久留村的學識之庭去，
將通過智慧考驗的好消息
帶給泉屋野依老師吧。<stop_lip_animation n00251 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121.en:
<voice 00187_00000121><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>That answer you gave to Professor
Toyohoro... What was up with that?<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121.ja:
<voice 00187_00000121><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「さっきの　トヨホロ先生への答え……
　あれは　なんだ？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121.ko:
<voice 00187_00000121><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 조금 전에 토요호로 선생님께 한 대답……
　그건 대체 뭐야?<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121.zh-Hans:
<voice 00187_00000121><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>对于丰幌老师的问题……
你刚刚的回答算是什么呀？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121.zh-Hant:
<voice 00187_00000121><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>對於剛才豐幌老師的問題……
你那回答是怎麼回事？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122.en:
<voice 00217_00000122><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>The professor was happy, but...
I saw right through you. That's not your usual answer!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122.ja:
<voice 00217_00000122><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「トヨホロ先生は　よろこんでいたが
　……ボクには　わかる。
　あんなの　いつものキミの答えじゃない！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122.ko:
<voice 00217_00000122><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 토요호로 선생님은 기뻐하셨지만
　……내 눈은 못 속여.
　그건 평소의 네가 할 만한 대답이 아니야!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122.zh-Hans:
<voice 00217_00000122><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>虽然丰幌老师很满意……
但是我知道，
平时的你才不会那样回答呢！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122.zh-Hant:
<voice 00217_00000122><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>雖然豐幌老師很滿意……
但是我知道，
平時的你才不會那樣回答！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

123.en:
<voice 00307_00000123><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>I don't know what you're doing, but
please take the trial of strength seriously.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
123.ja:
<voice 00307_00000123><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「どういうつもりか　知らないが
　力の試練は　マジメにやってくれよ。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
123.ko:
<voice 00307_00000123><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 무슨 꿍꿍이인진 모르겠지만
　힘의 시련에는 진지하게 임하도록 해.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
123.zh-Hans:
<voice 00307_00000123><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>虽然我不知道你是怎么想的，
不过力量试炼要认真对待啊。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
123.zh-Hant:
<voice 00307_00000123><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>雖然我不知道你是怎麼想的，
不過力量考驗可要認真對待啊。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9587.en:
<voice 00145_00009587><start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>Did you have a good night's rest?
I think that we're going to learn the
results soon, I'm a little nervous.<stop_lip_animation n00216 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9587.ja:
<voice 00145_00009587><start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>「よく　お休みになれましたか？
　いよいよ　結果が出ると思うと
　なんだかキンチョーしちゃいますね。<stop_lip_animation n00216 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9587.ko:
<voice 00145_00009587><start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>: 푹 쉬셨나요?
　곧 결과가 나온다고 생각하니
　왠지 긴장되네요.<stop_lip_animation n00216 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9587.zh-Hans:
<voice 00145_00009587><start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>休息好了吗？
一想到要公布结果，
我就紧张得不得了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00216 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9587.zh-Hant:
<voice 00145_00009587><start_lip_sync n00216 _normal m00001>休息夠了嗎？
一想到結果要出來了，
我就緊張到不行呢。<stop_lip_animation n00216 CLOSE_MOUTH>

125.en: <voice 00415_00000125><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I couldn't answer a single question...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125.ja: <voice 00415_00000125><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「私……　全然　答えられなかったの……。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125.ko: <voice 00415_00000125><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 저…… 하나도 대답하지 못했어요…….<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125.zh-Hans: <voice 00415_00000125><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>我……完全无法回答……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125.zh-Hant: <voice 00415_00000125><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>我……完全無法回答……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

126.en: <voice 00445_00000126><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I studied so hard, but...  my mind just went blank...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
126.ja:
<voice 00445_00000126><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「あんなに……勉強したのに
　アタマが　真っ白になっちゃって……。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
126.ko:
<voice 00445_00000126><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 그렇게…… 열심히 공부했는데
　머릿속이 새하얘져서…….<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
126.zh-Hans:
<voice 00445_00000126><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>明明那么……努力地学习过了，
但脑子里却是一片空白……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
126.zh-Hant:
<voice 00445_00000126><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>明明那麼……努力地學習過了，
但腦子裡卻是一片空白……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

128.en: <voice 00495_00000128><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Hey, <pc>. Even if I don't pass the trial of knowledge...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
128.ja:
<voice 00495_00000128><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「ねえ　<pc>さま。
　もし　私が　知の試練に受からなくても……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
128.ko:
<voice 00495_00000128><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 있잖아요, <pc> 님.
　만약 제가 지식의 시련에 합격하지 못해도……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
128.zh-Hans:
<voice 00495_00000128><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>大人，
即使我没有通过智慧试炼……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
128.zh-Hant:
<voice 00495_00000128><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>大人，
即使我沒有通過智慧考驗……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

129.en: <voice 00555_00000129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>You'll still be my friend, won't you?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129.ja: <voice 00555_00000129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「ずっとずっと　友達でいてくれるよね？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129.ko: <voice 00555_00000129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 계속 친구로 지내 주실 거죠?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129.zh-Hans: <voice 00555_00000129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>你也会一直、一直和我做朋友吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
129.zh-Hant: <voice 00555_00000129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>你也會一直、一直和我做朋友吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

130.ja: <voice 00590_00000130><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「ほっ……本当！？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130.ko: <voice 00590_00000130><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 저…… 정말요!?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130.zh-Hans: <voice 00590_00000130><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>真……真的吗？！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130.zh-Hant: <voice 00590_00000130><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>真……真的嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

131.en:
<voice 00618_00000131><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Thank you, <pc>! I won't mope about it anymore, because I
know you're there for me.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
131.ja:
<voice 00618_00000131><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　<pc>さま！
　もう　クヨクヨしないよ。
　<pc>さまが　いてくれるもん。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
131.ko:
<voice 00618_00000131><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 고마워요, <pc> 님!
　저 이제 더는 침울해하지 않을게요.
　제게는 <pc> 님이 있으니까요.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
131.zh-Hans:
<voice 00618_00000131><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>谢谢你，<pc>大人！
我不会再闷闷不乐了。
因为有<pc>大人在嘛！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
131.zh-Hant:
<voice 00618_00000131><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>謝謝你，<pc>大人！
我不會再悶悶不樂了。
因為有<pc>大人在嘛。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

135.en:
<voice 00795_00000135><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>That means...  You don't want to
be friends with me when I'm all gloomy like this, right?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
135.ja:
<voice 00795_00000135><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「それって……　こんな暗い私とは
　友達でいたくないって　意味だよね？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
135.ko:
<voice 00795_00000135><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 그 말은…… 이렇게 어두운 저하고는
　친구로 지내기 싫단 뜻이죠?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
135.zh-Hans:
<voice 00795_00000135><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>就是说……不想和我这种
阴沉的人做朋友，是吧？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
135.zh-Hant:
<voice 00795_00000135><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>就是說……不想和我這種
陰沉的人做朋友，是吧？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

136.en: <voice 00825_00000136><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Alright, then I'll cheer up! I won't mope about anymore. I don't want you to look down on me!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
136.ja:
<voice 00825_00000136><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「わかった　元気出すよ！
　もう　クヨクヨしない。
　<pc>さまに　きらわれたくないもん！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
136.ko:
<voice 00825_00000136><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 알았어요, 기운 낼게요!
　저 이제 더는 침울해하지 않을게요.
　<pc> 님에게 미움받기 싫으니까요!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
136.zh-Hans:
<voice 00825_00000136><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>我知道了！我会打起精神的！
不会再闷闷不乐了。
因为我可不想被<pc>大人讨厌呢！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
136.zh-Hant:
<voice 00825_00000136><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>我知道了！我會打起精神的！
不會再悶悶不樂了。
因為我可不想被<pc>大人討厭呢！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

137.en: <voice 00895_00000137><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>There you are, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
137.ja: <voice 00895_00000137><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「<pc>　ここにいたのか。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
137.ko: <voice 00895_00000137><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 여기 있었군.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
137.zh-Hans: <voice 00895_00000137><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001><pc>，原来你在这里。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
137.zh-Hant: <voice 00895_00000137><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001><pc>，原來你在這裡。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

138.en: <voice 00925_00000138><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>They're about to announce who passed the trial of knowledge. We are to gather in the square.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
138.ja:
<voice 00925_00000138><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「これから　知の試練の
　合格者発表をするらしいぞ。
　全員　広場に　集まれってさ。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
138.ko:
<voice 00925_00000138><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 이제부터 지식의 시련의
　합격자를 발표한다고 해.
　모두 광장으로 모이라는군.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
138.zh-Hans:
<voice 00925_00000138><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>待会儿就该公布
智慧试炼的合格者了。
所有人都得到广场集合。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
138.zh-Hant:
<voice 00925_00000138><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>接下來好像就要公布
智慧考驗的合格者了。
所有人都得到廣場集合。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

139.en:
<voice 01080_00000139><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>But somehow, I have this feeling that something odd's afoot...
Well, whatever.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
139.ja:
<voice 01080_00000139><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「それにしても　なんか変だな……。

19001518.ja:
<pc>は
ルーラストーンを　受け取った！<me 61>

39108.en:
The Zoomstone allows you to travel
to a recorded location instantly.
It can be used indefinitely .
39108.ja:
ルーラストーンは　記憶させた場所に
一瞬で移動できる　魔法の石です。
何度使っても　なくなりません。
39108.ko:
루라 스톤은 등록한 장소로
단숨에 이동할 수 있는 마법의 돌입니다.
여러 번 사용해도 없어지지 않습니다.
39108.zh-Hans:
鲁拉之石是魔法之石，
可以瞬间让你移动到它记录的地点。
反复使用也不会消失。
39108.zh-Hant:
魯拉石是魔法之石，
可以瞬間讓你移動到它記錄的地點。
反覆使用也不會消失。

19000628.en:
There is no location set in this Zoomstone
yet. You may set one at the church.
19000628.ja:
このルーラストーンには
ツスクルの村が　記憶されています。
19000628.ko:
이 루라 스톤에는
투스쿠르 마을이 새겨져 있습니다.
19000628.zh-Hans:
这块鲁拉之石
记录着津洲久留村。
19000628.zh-Hant:
這塊魯拉石
記錄著津洲久留村。

19000629.en:
In addition to towns, you may set
other locations by searching for stone
monuments located around the world.
19000629.ja:
冒険で訪れた場所が　記憶されるほか　
各地にある　いざないの石碑を　しらべることで
そこを　行き先として　記憶させられます。
19000629.ko:
모험에서 방문한 장소가 새겨질 뿐 아니라
각지에 있는 이끌림의 비석을 조사하면
그곳을 목적지로 등록할 수 있습니다.
19000629.zh-Hans:
除了会记录在冒险中探访过的地点以外，
在调查各地的引路石碑后，
更可将其记录为目的地。
19000629.zh-Hant:
除了會記錄在冒險中探訪過的地點以外，
在調查各地的引路石碑後，
更可將其記錄為目的地。

<voice 00878_00000184><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>也是啊，这样会让你感到尴尬的。
虽然很遗憾，不过我还是老老实实地回去吧……<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
184.zh-Hant:
<voice 00878_00000184><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>也是，總不能讓你難做人。
雖然遺憾，不過我還是老老實實地回去吧……<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

185.en: <voice 00975_00000185><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>Love you, Ucharin.<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
185.ja: <voice 00975_00000185><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>「愛してるよ　ユーチャーリン。<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
185.ko: <voice 00975_00000185><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>: 사랑해, 유차린.<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
185.zh-Hans: <voice 00975_00000185><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>我爱你哟，夕茶铃！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
185.zh-Hant: <voice 00975_00000185><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>我愛妳，夕茶鈴。<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

186.en: <voice 01095_00000186><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>You're so kind, Kyusuke.<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
186.ja: <voice 01095_00000186><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>「うれしい……　キュウスケさん。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
186.ko: <voice 01095_00000186><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>: 기뻐요…… 큐스케 씨.<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
186.zh-Hans: <voice 01095_00000186><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>我很高兴……久助。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
186.zh-Hant: <voice 01095_00000186><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>我很高興……久助先生。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>

187.en: <voice 01294_00000187><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>Well, I'd better be going. Adios!!!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
187.ja:
<voice 01294_00000187><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　また来年なっ！
　アディオース！！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
187.ko:
<voice 01294_00000187><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>: 그럼 내년에 또 만나자!
　아디오스!!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
187.zh-Hans:
<voice 01294_00000187><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>那么，明年再见啦！
拜拜！！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
187.zh-Hant:
<voice 01294_00000187><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>那麼，明年再見啦！
拜拜！！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

188.en:
<voice 01607_00000188><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Pathetic...How'd a guy like him
pass the trial of knowledge?<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
188.ja:
<voice 01607_00000188><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「まったく　なげかわしい……。
　あのような者が　知の試練の合格者とは。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
188.ko:
<voice 01607_00000188><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 나 참, 한심해서 원…….
　저런 사람이 지식의 시련 합격자라니.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
188.zh-Hans:
<voice 01607_00000188><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>真是个可悲的家伙……
那种人居然也能通过智慧试炼。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
188.zh-Hant:
<voice 01607_00000188><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>真是個可悲的傢伙……
那種人居然也能通過智慧考驗。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

189.en:
<voice 01837_00000189><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Sorry to keep you waiting.  Now, let's go to priestess Himea and
hear what she has to say.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
189.ja:
<voice 01837_00000189><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「お待たせしましたね。
　では　巫女ヒメア様のもとへ
　お言葉を　たまわりにいきましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
189.ko:
<voice 01837_00000189><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 오래 기다리시게 해서 죄송합니다.
　그럼 무녀 히메아 님의 말씀을 들으러
　이만 가 보실까요.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
189.zh-Hans:
<voice 01837_00000189><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>久等了。
那么，请到巫女卑弥亚大人那里去，
让她赠予你话语吧。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
189.zh-Hant:
<voice 01837_00000189><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>久等了。
那麼，請到巫女卑彌亞大人那裡去，
讓她贈予你話語吧。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

190.en: <voice 02081_00000190><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Pardon the intrusion. I've brought the last one.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
190.ja:
<voice 02081_00000190><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「失礼いたします。
　最後の者を　連れて参りました。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
190.ko:
<voice 02081_00000190><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 실례합니다.
　마지막 합격자를 데려왔습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
190.zh-Hans:
<voice 02081_00000190><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>打扰了。
我将最后一位合格者带来了。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
190.zh-Hant:
<voice 02081_00000190><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>打擾了。
我將最後一位合格者帶來了。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

192.en:
<voice 02317_00000192><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>Thank goodness... It seems Lady
Himea's prayers have been answered.<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
192.ja:
<voice 02317_00000192><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>「よかった……　ヒメア様の祈りが
　届いていたようですね。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
192.ko:
<voice 02317_00000192><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>: 다행입니다…… 히메아 님의 기도가
　효험이 있었던 것 같군요.<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
192.zh-Hans:
<voice 02317_00000192><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>太好了……卑弥亚大人的祈祷
传达到了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
192.zh-Hant:
<voice 02317_00000192><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>太好了……
看來卑彌亞大人的祈禱傳達到了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>

193.en:
You've been on both of our minds
for a long time. You always work so
hard in the Garden of Learning.
193.ja:
<voice 02382_00000193><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>「あなたのことは　ヒメア様も　私も
　ずっと　気にかけていたのですよ。
　学びの庭で　いつも　がんばっていますね。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
193.ko:
<voice 02382_00000193><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>: 저도 히메아 님도 계속
　당신을 걱정하고 있었어요.
　배움의 뜰에서 늘 열심히 공부하고 있죠?<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
193.zh-Hans:
<voice 02382_00000193><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>卑弥亚大人和我都很关注你。
你在学识之庭一直都很努力呢。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
193.zh-Hant:
<voice 02382_00000193><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>卑彌亞大人和我
都很關注你。
你在學識之庭一直都很努力呢。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>

194.en: <voice 02467_00000194><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>That's enough, Noma...<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
194.ja: <voice 02467_00000194><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「ノマ……　下がりなさい。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
194.ko: <voice 02467_00000194><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 노마…… 이만 물러나세요.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
194.zh-Hans: <voice 02467_00000194><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>野间……退下。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
194.zh-Hant: <voice 02467_00000194><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>野間……退下。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

195.ja: <voice 02576_00000195><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>「す　すみません……。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
195.ko: <voice 02576_00000195><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>: 죄, 죄송합니다…….<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
195.zh-Hans: <voice 02576_00000195><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>对、对不起……<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
195.zh-Hant: <voice 02576_00000195><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>對、對不起……<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>

196.en: <voice 02732_00000196><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>I'm so glad you're okay, <pc>. You'll have to be more careful.<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196.ja:
<voice 02732_00000196><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>「<pc>　本当に　無事でよかった。
　今度は　気をつけるんですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196.ko:
<voice 02732_00000196><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 무사해서 정말로 다행입니다.
　앞으로는 조심하도록 해요.<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196.zh-Hans:
<voice 02732_00000196><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001><pc>，你没事真是太好了。
下回可要小心呢。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
196.zh-Hant:
<voice 02732_00000196><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001><pc>，你沒事真是太好了。
下回可要小心啊。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>

199.en: <voice 03060_00000199><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>No, let's worry about that later.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
199.ja: <voice 03060_00000199><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「いや　今は　よいでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
199.ko: <voice 03060_00000199><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 아뇨, 지금은 됐습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
199.zh-Hans: <voice 03060_00000199><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>不，现在还是先算了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
199.zh-Hant: <voice 03060_00000199><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>不，現在還是先算了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

200.en: <voice 03124_00000200><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>. Young leaf overflowing with wisdom.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
200.ja:
<voice 03124_00000200><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「<pc>。
　あふれる知恵を示した　若葉よ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
200.ko:
<voice 03124_00000200><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　넘치는 지혜를 증명한 새싹이여.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
200.zh-Hans:
<voice 03124_00000200><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>。
充满智慧的新叶啊。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
200.zh-Hant:
<voice 03124_00000200><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>。
充滿智慧的新葉啊。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

201.en:
<voice 03194_00000201><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Your role in this world is still
unknown...<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
201.ja:
<voice 03194_00000201><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「この世界における　そなたの役目は
　まだ　わかりません。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
201.ko:
<voice 03194_00000201><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 이 세계에서 그대의 역할이
　무엇인지는 아직 알 수 없습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
201.zh-Hans:
<voice 03194_00000201><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>你在这个世界的职责
还不明确。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
201.zh-Hant:
<voice 03194_00000201><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>你在這個世界的職責
還不明確。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

202.en:
<voice 03275_00000202><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>However, if you overcome the next trial, you will gain the means
to travel the world.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
202.ja:
<voice 03275_00000202><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「しかし　次なる試練……
　力の試練に　打ち勝てば
　世界をめぐる手段を　得られるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
202.ko:
<voice 03275_00000202><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 하지만 다음 시련인 힘의 시련을 통과하면
　세상을 탐험할 수단을 얻을 수 있을 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
202.zh-Hans:
<voice 03275_00000202><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>但是，接下来的试炼……
只要能够在力量试炼中获胜，
就可以获得周游世界的方法。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
202.zh-Hant:
<voice 03275_00000202><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>但是，接下來的考驗……
只要能夠在力量考驗中獲勝，
就可以獲得周遊世界的方法。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

203.en:
<voice 03380_00000203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>If you wish to open the door to the
outside world, proceed with the trials.
May the wind's blessing be upon you.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
203.ja:
<voice 03380_00000203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「外界への扉を　開きたければ
　心して　試練に　のぞみなさい。
　<pc>に　風の祝福が　あらんことを。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
203.ko:
<voice 03380_00000203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 바깥 세상으로 가는 문을 열고 싶다면
　마음 굳게 먹고 시련에 임하십시오.
　<pc>에게 바람의 축복이 있기를.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
203.zh-Hans:
<voice 03380_00000203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>若你想打开通往外界的大门，
就要留心面对试炼。
愿风的祝福与<pc>同在。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
203.zh-Hant:
<voice 03380_00000203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>若你想打開通往外界的大門，
就要留心面對考驗。
願風的祝福與<pc>同在。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

33092.en:
<voice 03563_00033092><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Please be sure to keep Lady Himea's
words close to your heart. Come on, let's go.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33092.ja:
<voice 03563_00033092><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「ヒメア様の　お言葉
　しかと　胸に刻んでおくのですよ。
　では　みそぎの間へと　参りましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33092.ko:
<voice 03563_00033092><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 히메아 님의 말씀을
　가슴에 잘 새겨 두세요.
　그럼 정화의 방으로 가죠.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33092.zh-Hans:
<voice 03563_00033092><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>要好好记住
卑弥亚大人说的话。
那我们前往祓禊之室吧。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33092.zh-Hant:
<voice 03563_00033092><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>要好好記住
卑彌亞大人說的話。
那我們前往祓禊之間吧。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

204.en: <voice 03971_00000204><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Welcome to the Chamber of Purification.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
204.ja: <voice 03971_00000204><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「こちらが　みそぎの間です。お入りください。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
204.ko: <voice 03971_00000204><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 이곳이 정화의 방입니다. 들어가세요.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
204.zh-Hans: <voice 03971_00000204><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>这里就是祓禊之室。请进。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
204.zh-Hant: <voice 03971_00000204><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>這裡就是祓禊之間。請進。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

205.en: <voice 04194_00000205><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Come, Ucharin. Let us begin the purification.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
205.ja:
<voice 04194_00000205><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「ユーチャーリン。
　さあ　この方に　みそぎを。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
205.ko:
<voice 04194_00000205><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 유차린.
　이분의 정화를 부탁합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
205.zh-Hans:
<voice 04194_00000205><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>夕茶铃，
来，请为这位进行祓禊。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
205.zh-Hant:
<voice 04194_00000205><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>夕茶鈴，
來，請為這位進行祓禊。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

207.en:
<voice 04394_00000207><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>The Yggdrahill that you're about to
visit is a sacred place that's been
protected for generations.<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
207.ja:
<voice 04394_00000207><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>「あなたが　これから行く　世界樹の丘は
　この村の巫女たちが　長きに渡って
　代々　守り継いできた　聖地です。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
207.ko:
<voice 04394_00000207><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>: 이제부터 당신이 가는 세계수 언덕은
　이 마을 무녀들이 오랜 세월
　대대로 지켜 온 성지입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
207.zh-Hans:
<voice 04394_00000207><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>你接下来要去的世界树之丘，
是这个村里的巫女长久以来
代代守护的圣地。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
207.zh-Hant:
<voice 04394_00000207><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>你接下來要去的世界樹丘陵，
是這個村裡的巫女長久以來
代代守護的聖地。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>

208.en:
<voice 04519_00000208><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>Before you undergo the trial, we shall first
cleanse you with the dew of Yggdrasil.<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
208.ja:
<voice 04519_00000208><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>「その地で　力の試練を受ける前に
　世界樹の朝つゆにて
　身のけがれを　はらいましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
208.ko:
<voice 04519_00000208><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>: 그곳에서 힘의 시련을 치르기에 앞서
　이 세계수의 이슬로
　몸의 부정을 씻어드리겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
208.zh-Hans:
<voice 04519_00000208><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>在那里接受力量试炼之前，
请先用世界树的朝露
洗净身上的污浊吧。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
208.zh-Hant:
<voice 04519_00000208><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>在那裡接受力量考驗之前，
請先用世界樹的朝露
洗淨身上的汙濁吧。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>

209.en:
<voice 04735_00000209><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>May the blessings of the World Tree
and of the wind be with you...<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
209.ja:
<voice 04735_00000209><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>「世界樹と　風の祝福が
　あなたと共に　ありますように……。<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
209.ko:
<voice 04735_00000209><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>: 세계수와 바람의 축복이
　당신과 함께하기를…….<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
209.zh-Hans:
<voice 04735_00000209><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>愿世界树与风的祝福
与你同在……<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>
209.zh-Hant:
<voice 04735_00000209><start_lip_sync n00245 _normal m00001>願世界樹與風的祝福
與你同在……<stop_lip_animation n00245 CLOSE_MOUTH>

33093.en:
<voice 04883_00033093><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Now that you've been purified, you're
ready to face the trial of strength.
Come on, let's go.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33093.ja:
<voice 04883_00033093><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「これで　そなたの身は　清められ
　力の試練へ望む準備が　終わりました。
　さあ　参りましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33093.ko:
<voice 04883_00033093><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 이걸로 그대의 몸은 정화되어
　힘의 시련에 임할 준비가 갖춰졌습니다.
　자, 가죠.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33093.zh-Hans:
<voice 04883_00033093><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>这样你的身体经过净化，
接受力量试炼的事前准备就结束了。
好，我们走吧。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33093.zh-Hant:
<voice 04883_00033093><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>這樣你的身體經過淨化，
接受力量考驗的事前準備就結束了。
好，我們走吧。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26967.en:
<voice 05083_00026967><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Yggdrahill is deep in the Eternal
Wood, east of the village. There, the
spirit of the World Tree shall trial you.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26967.ja:
<voice 05083_00026967><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「世界樹の丘は　この村の東　久遠の森の奥です。
　そこで　世界樹の精霊が
　あなたに　力の試練を与えるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26967.ko:
<voice 05083_00026967><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 세계수 언덕은 이 마을 동쪽에 있는 영원의 숲
　안쪽에 있습니다. 그곳에서 세계수의 정령이
　당신에게 힘의 시련을 내릴 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26967.zh-Hans:
<voice 05083_00026967><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>世界树之丘就位于这座村子东边久远森林的深处，
世界树的精灵会在那里
让你接受力量试炼。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26967.zh-Hant:
<voice 05083_00026967><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>世界樹丘陵就位於這座村子東邊久遠森林的深處，
世界樹精靈會在那裡
讓你接受力量考驗。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

210.en: <voice 05133_00000210><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Please, take care.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
210.ja: <voice 05133_00000210><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「どうぞ　お気をつけて。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
210.ko: <voice 05133_00000210><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 그럼 조심해서 가세요.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
210.zh-Hans: <voice 05133_00000210><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>请一定要多加小心。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
210.zh-Hant: <voice 05133_00000210><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>請一定要多加小心。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

211.en:
<voice 00152_00000211><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>I knew you'd be here first. I am
Master Kou, the one who shall bear witness to the trial of strength.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
211.ja:
<voice 00152_00000211><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「やはり　そなたが　一番乗りか。
　私は　師コウ。
　力の試練を　見届ける者。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
211.ko:
<voice 00152_00000211><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: 역시 네가 가장 먼저 도착했군.
　나는 스승 코우.
　힘의 시련의 입회인이다.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
211.zh-Hans:
<voice 00152_00000211><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>你果然是最早到的。
我是导师钢，
力量试炼的见证人。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
211.zh-Hant:
<voice 00152_00000211><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>你果然是最早到的。
我是導師鋼，
力量考驗的見證人。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

212.en: <voice 00270_00000212><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>Glad you made it, friend! I'm known as the spirit of leaves.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
212.ja:
<voice 00270_00000212><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「よく来た　友よ！
　オリは　若葉の精霊ダワ。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
212.ko:
<voice 00270_00000212><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 잘 왔다, 친구여!
　나는 새싹의 정령이다.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
212.zh-Hans:
<voice 00270_00000212><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>欢迎你，朋友！
我是新叶精灵。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
212.zh-Hant:
<voice 00270_00000212><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>歡迎你，朋友！
我是新葉精靈。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

213.en:
<voice 00300_00000213><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>I was born with the World Tree.
I've been trialing the strength of
learners like you for a long time.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
213.ja:
<voice 00300_00000213><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「この世界樹と　ともに生まれ
　はるか昔より　学びの徒たちのチカラを
　試し続けてきたのダワ。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
213.ko:
<voice 00300_00000213><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 이 세계수와 함께 태어나
　먼 옛날부터 배움의 뜰 학생들의
　힘을 시험하고 있다.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
213.zh-Hans:
<voice 00300_00000213><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>我和世界树一起诞生，
从遥远的过去开始，
一直在试炼学生们的力量。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
213.zh-Hant:
<voice 00300_00000213><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>我和世界樹一起誕生，
從遙遠的過去開始，
一直在考驗學生們的力量。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

214.en: <voice 00350_00000214><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>Come on, friends! Beat me and show everyone your power!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
214.ja:
<voice 00350_00000214><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「さあ友よ！
　オリに打ち勝ち　チカラを示せ！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
214.ko:
<voice 00350_00000214><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 자, 친구여!
　날 이겨 힘을 증명해 봐라!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
214.zh-Hans:
<voice 00350_00000214><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>来吧，朋友！
战胜我，展现你的实力吧！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
214.zh-Hant:
<voice 00350_00000214><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>來吧，朋友！
戰勝我，展現你的實力吧！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9198.en:
<voice 00380_00009198><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>This is the trial of strength! If you
can overcome this trial, you'll be
recognized as a full-fledged adult!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9198.ja:
<voice 00380_00009198><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「それこそが　力の試練！ 
　この試練を乗り越えれば　お前は
　真の一人前と　認められるんダワ！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9198.ko:
<voice 00380_00009198><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 그것이 바로 힘의 시련!
　이 시련을 극복하면 넌
　진정한 모험가로 인정받을 수 있다!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9198.zh-Hans:
<voice 00380_00009198><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>这就是力量试炼！
只要通过了这个试炼，
你就可以成为独当一面的合格者了！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9198.zh-Hant:
<voice 00380_00009198><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>這就是力量考驗！ 
只要通過這個考驗，
你就能被認可是能獨當一面的合格者了！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

215.ja: <voice 00492_00000215><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>よ　準備は　よいな？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
215.ko: <voice 00492_00000215><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 준비는 됐겠지?<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
215.zh-Hans: <voice 00492_00000215><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，你准备好了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
215.zh-Hant: <voice 00492_00000215><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，你準備好了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

216.en: <voice 00522_00000216><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001><pc>'s trial of strength shall now commence!!<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
216.ja:
<voice 00522_00000216><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「これより　<cs_pchero>の
　力の試練を始めるっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
216.ko:
<voice 00522_00000216><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: 지금부터 <cs_pchero>의
　힘의 시련을 시작하겠다!!<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
216.zh-Hans:
<voice 00522_00000216><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>接下来，开始进行<cs_pchero>
的力量试炼！！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
216.zh-Hant:
<voice 00522_00000216><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>接下來，開始進行<cs_pchero>
的力量考驗！！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

217.en: <voice 00040_00000217><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>! You're back.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
217.ja: <voice 00040_00000217><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「おお　<cs_pchero>よ。戻ってきたか。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
217.ko: <voice 00040_00000217><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: 오오, <cs_pchero>. 돌아왔군.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
217.zh-Hans: <voice 00040_00000217><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>哦哦，<cs_pchero>啊！你回来了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
217.zh-Hant: <voice 00040_00000217><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>喔喔，<cs_pchero>啊！你回來了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

218.en:
<voice 00070_00000218><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>I commend your perseverance, so
I will allow you to try again.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
218.ja:
<voice 00070_00000218><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「その　不屈の精神を称え
　再挑戦を　認めよう。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
218.ko:
<voice 00070_00000218><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: 그 불굴의 의지를 보아
　재도전을 허락하겠다.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
218.zh-Hans:
<voice 00070_00000218><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>我赞赏你不屈不挠的精神，
允许你再次挑战。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
218.zh-Hant:
<voice 00070_00000218><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>我讚賞你不屈不撓的精神，
允許你再次挑戰。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

219.en: <voice 00148_00000219><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>Come on, friend! Show me what you're made of!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
219.ja:
<voice 00148_00000219><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「さあ来い　友よ！ 
　お前のチカラのすべてを　見せてみるのダワ！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
219.ko:
<voice 00148_00000219><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 자 덤벼라, 친구여! 
　네가 가진 모든 힘을 보여 봐라!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
219.zh-Hans:
<voice 00148_00000219><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>来吧，朋友！ 
让我看看你所有的力量吧！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
219.zh-Hant:
<voice 00148_00000219><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>來吧，朋友！ 
讓我看看你所有的力量吧！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

220.ja: <voice 00089_00000220><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「まいったダワ！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
220.ko: <voice 00089_00000220><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 내가 졌다!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
220.zh-Hans: <voice 00089_00000220><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>败给你了！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
220.zh-Hant: <voice 00089_00000220><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>我敗給你了！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

221.en: <voice 00114_00000221><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>You really gave it your all! Great job!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
221.ja:
<voice 00114_00000221><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「お前　よく　がんばった！
　なかなか　いいダワ！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
221.ko:
<voice 00114_00000221><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 너, 열심히 노력했다!
　제법 괜찮았다!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
221.zh-Hans:
<voice 00114_00000221><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>你很努力！
很棒！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
221.zh-Hant:
<voice 00114_00000221><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>你很努力！
很棒！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

222.en: <voice 00338_00000222><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>You've passed the trial of strength!!<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
222.ja: <voice 00338_00000222><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>　力の試練　合格！！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
222.ko: <voice 00338_00000222><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 힘의 시련 합격!!<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
222.zh-Hans: <voice 00338_00000222><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，力量试炼合格！！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
222.zh-Hant: <voice 00338_00000222><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，力量考驗合格！！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

223.en:
<voice 00612_00000223><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>This is the third World Tree. The
forces of darkness have tried many
times to erase it from the world.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
223.ja:
<voice 00612_00000223><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「この世界樹は　３本目の世界樹。
　悪しき者たちは　何度も
　地上から　世界樹を消そうとしたのダワ。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
223.ko:
<voice 00612_00000223><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 이 세계수는 세 번째 세계수다.
　사악한 자들은 몇 번이고
　지상에서 세계수를 없애려 했다.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
223.zh-Hans:
<voice 00612_00000223><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>这棵世界树是第３棵世界树。
一些恶徒三番五次
想把世界树从世界上铲除。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
223.zh-Hant:
<voice 00612_00000223><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>這棵世界樹是第３棵世界樹了。
一些惡徒三番兩次
想把世界樹從世界上剷除。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

224.en:
<voice 00666_00000224><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>But each time, a courageous priestess
from Tsusukul has risen up to guard
the World Tree and protect it.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
224.ja:
<voice 00666_00000224><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「だが　そのたびに　勇気ある
　ツスクルの巫女が　立ち上がり
　世界樹が絶えないように　はばんできたダワ。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
224.ko:
<voice 00666_00000224><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그때마다 용감한
　투스쿠르의 무녀가 그자들과 맞서
　세계수가 사라지지 않도록 막았다.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
224.zh-Hans:
<voice 00666_00000224><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>但是，每到那种时候，津洲久留
勇敢的巫女就会站出来，
阻止世界树被毁灭。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
224.zh-Hant:
<voice 00666_00000224><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>但是，每到那種時候，津洲久留
勇敢的巫女就會站出來，
阻止世界樹被毀滅。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

225.en: <voice 00726_00000225><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>As long as you hold on to your courage the path to your future will never be cut off!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
225.ja:
<voice 00726_00000225><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「オリにチカラを示した者よ。
　お前も　その勇気を忘れないかぎり
　未来への道が　途絶えることはないダワ！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
225.ko:
<voice 00726_00000225><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 내게 힘을 증명한 자여.
　너 역시 그 용기를 잊지 않는 한
　미래로 가는 길이 끊기지 않을 것이다!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
225.zh-Hans:
<voice 00726_00000225><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>向我展示力量的人啊，
只要你不忘记这份勇气，
未来的道路就会一路畅通！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
225.zh-Hant:
<voice 00726_00000225><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>向我展示力量的人啊，
只要你不忘記這份勇氣，
未來的道路就會一路暢通！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

226.en:
<voice 00811_00000226><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>Well done, <cs_pchero>! Once you receive your Mark of Adulthood,
you can graduate from the Garden.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
226.ja:
<voice 00811_00000226><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>よ　見事だったぞ！
　これで　巫女ヒメア様から　一人前の証を
　受け取れば　学びの庭は　卒業だな。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
226.ko:
<voice 00811_00000226><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 정말 잘했다!
　이제 무녀 히메아 님께 모험가의 증표를
　받으면 배움의 뜰은 졸업이군.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
226.zh-Hans:
<voice 00811_00000226><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，你表现得太好了！
这样只要从巫女卑弥亚大人那里得到合格者的证明，
你就能从学识之庭毕业了。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
226.zh-Hant:
<voice 00811_00000226><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，你表現得太好了！
這樣只要從巫女卑彌亞大人那裡得到合格者之證，
你就能從學識之庭畢業了。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

227.en:
<voice 00882_00000227><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>Now then, on to the next one...
Kyusuke and Asanagi. Which of you will be next?<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
227.ja:
<voice 00882_00000227><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「では　次……。キュウスケと　アサナギよ。
　力の試練は　どちらから受けるかね？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
227.ko:
<voice 00882_00000227><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: 그럼 다음……. 큐스케와 아사나기.
　누가 먼저 힘의 시련을 받겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
227.zh-Hans:
<voice 00882_00000227><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>那再来……久助和朝薙，
你们谁要先接受力量试炼？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
227.zh-Hant:
<voice 00882_00000227><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>那再來……久助和麻薙，
你們誰要先接受力量考驗？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

228.en: <voice 00964_00000228><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>It's okay if you start with Asanagi! I can do it later.<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
228.ja:
<voice 00964_00000228><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>「アサナギからで　いいでーす！
　オレは　後から　テキトーで。<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
228.ko:
<voice 00964_00000228><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>: 아사나기 먼저 하라고 하세요!
　전 나중에 천천히 하죠 뭐.<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
228.zh-Hans:
<voice 00964_00000228><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>朝薙先吧！
我待会儿随便参加就行。<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
228.zh-Hant:
<voice 00964_00000228><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>麻薙先吧！
我待會兒隨便參加就行。<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

230.en: <voice 01081_00000230><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>Kyusuke. Isn't it about time you took the trial seriously?<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
230.ja:
<voice 01081_00000230><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「キュウスケよ。
　お前も　そろそろ本気で
　力の試練に　取り組むべきではないか？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
230.ko:
<voice 01081_00000230><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: 큐스케.
　너도 이제 그만 진지하게
　힘의 시련에 임해야 하지 않겠느냐?<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
230.zh-Hans:
<voice 01081_00000230><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>久助，
你也差不多该认真面对
力量试炼了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
230.zh-Hant:
<voice 01081_00000230><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>久助，
你也差不多該認真面對
力量考驗了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

231.en:
<voice 01147_00000231><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>At this rate you're barely a man.
Even if you want to protect a lady,
you won't be able to!<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
231.ja:
<voice 01147_00000231><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「このままでは　ずっと半人前。
　守りたい女性がいても　守れぬぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
231.ko:
<voice 01147_00000231><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: 이대로는 언제까지고 미숙한 엘프에서
　벗어나지 못해. 지키고 싶은 여자가
　있어도 제대로 지키지 못할 거다!<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
231.zh-Hans:
<voice 01147_00000231><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>这样下去你永远都是个半吊子，
连想保护的女子你也保护不了！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
231.zh-Hant:
<voice 01147_00000231><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>這樣下去你永遠都是個半吊子，
連想保護的女子你也保護不了！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

233.en:
<voice 01351_00000233><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>Well then, you're first, Asanagi.
When you're ready, step this way.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
233.ja:
<voice 01351_00000233><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「では　アサナギ。そなたから始めよう。
　準備ができたら　こちらへ。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
233.ko:
<voice 01351_00000233><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: 그럼 아사나기, 너부터 시작하지.
　준비가 되면 이쪽으로 와라.<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
233.zh-Hans:
<voice 01351_00000233><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>那么，朝薙，就从你开始吧。
准备好了就来这里。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
233.zh-Hant:
<voice 01351_00000233><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>那麼，麻薙，就從你開始吧。
準備好了就來這裡。<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

234.en: <voice 01625_00000234><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>I'm on to you, <pc>. What was with that frantic fighting?<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
234.ja:
<voice 01625_00000234><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「見せてもらったぞ　<cs_pchero>。
　なんだ　あの必死な戦い方は？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
234.ko:
<voice 01625_00000234><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 네 싸움은 다 봤다, <cs_pchero>.
　뭐냐, 그 형편없는 싸움은?<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
234.zh-Hans:
<voice 01625_00000234><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>我可是看到了哦，<cs_pchero>。
你怎么打得那么狼狈啊？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
234.zh-Hant:
<voice 01625_00000234><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>我可是看到了喔，<cs_pchero>。
你怎麼打得那麼狼狽啊？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

235.en: <voice 01656_00000235><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>Whatever. When I win, it'll be even more spectacular!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
235.ja:
<voice 01656_00000235><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「ボクは　もっと　あざやかに
　勝ってみせる！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
235.ko:
<voice 01656_00000235><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 나는 더
　멋지게 이기고 말겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
235.zh-Hans:
<voice 01656_00000235><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>如果是我的话，
一定能轻松获胜！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
235.zh-Hant:
<voice 01656_00000235><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>如果是我的話，
一定能輕鬆獲勝！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

236.ja: <voice 01731_00000236><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「危ないダワっ！！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

237.ja: <voice 01811_00000237><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「いってえ……。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

238.en: <voice 01855_00000238><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>Miasma in a holy place like this...?<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
238.ja: <voice 01855_00000238><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「こ　この聖なる地に　魔瘴だと……？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
238.ko: <voice 01855_00000238><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>: 이, 이 성스러운 땅에 마장이라니……?<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
238.zh-Hans: <voice 01855_00000238><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>在、在这神圣的土地上竟然有魔瘴……？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>
238.zh-Hant: <voice 01855_00000238><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>在、在這神聖的土地上竟然有魔瘴……？<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

239.en: <voice 01974_00000239><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>Go!! Quickly!! Don't touch it!!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
239.ja: <voice 01974_00000239><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「逃げろ！！　早く！！　触れたら死ぬダワ！！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
239.ko: <voice 01974_00000239><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 도망쳐라!! 빨리!! 닿으면 죽는다!!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
239.zh-Hans: <voice 01974_00000239><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>快逃！！快啊！！碰到可是会没命的！！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
239.zh-Hant: <voice 01974_00000239><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>快逃！！快啊！！碰到可是會沒命的！！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
