240.ja: <voice 02133_00000240><start_lip_sync n00253 _normal m00001>「ぐああああああああああああっ！！！<stop_lip_animation n00253 CLOSE_MOUTH>

242.en: <voice 02294_00000242><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>Run away! Hurry!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
242.ja: <voice 02294_00000242><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「早く　逃げろ！　逃げろダワ！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
242.ko: <voice 02294_00000242><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 빨리 도망쳐라! 어서!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
242.zh-Hans: <voice 02294_00000242><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>快逃！快逃啊！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
242.zh-Hant: <voice 02294_00000242><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>快逃！快點逃跑啊！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

243.ja: <voice 02381_00000243><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>　来いっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
243.ko: <voice 02381_00000243><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 이리 와!!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

244.en: <voice 02537_00000244><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>We're not gonna make it!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
244.ja: <voice 02537_00000244><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>「ダメだ……　間に合わない！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
244.ko: <voice 02537_00000244><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>: 틀렸어…… 이미 늦었어!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
244.zh-Hans: <voice 02537_00000244><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>不行……来不及！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
244.zh-Hant: <voice 02537_00000244><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>不行……來不及！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26968.en:
<voice 05362_00026968><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>The miasma has been dispelled...
What in the world was that light...?<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26968.ja:
<voice 05362_00026968><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「魔瘴が　かき消された……
　今の光は　いったい……。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26968.ko:
<voice 05362_00026968><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 마장이 사라졌어……
　방금 그 빛은 대체…….<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26968.zh-Hans:
<voice 05362_00026968><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>魔瘴消失了……
刚才的光究竟是……？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26968.zh-Hant:
<voice 05362_00026968><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>魔瘴消失了……
剛才的光究竟是……？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

245.en: <voice 05979_00000245><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>No... The World Tree is...<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
245.ja: <voice 05979_00000245><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「そんな……　世界樹が…………。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
245.ko: <voice 05979_00000245><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 이럴 수가…… 세계수가………….<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
245.zh-Hans: <voice 05979_00000245><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>怎么会……世界树竟然…………<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
245.zh-Hant: <voice 05979_00000245><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>怎麼會……世界樹竟然…………<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

246.en:
<voice 06037_00000246><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>Yggdrasil... You must... Live...!
Take my power...  All of it.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
246.ja:
<voice 06037_00000246><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「生きろ……　世界樹……！
　オリのチカラ……　全部　やるダワ。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
246.ko:
<voice 06037_00000246><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 살아라…… 세계수……!
　내 힘을…… 전부 주겠다.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
246.zh-Hans:
<voice 06037_00000246><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>要活下去啊……世界树……！
我的力量……全部都给你。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
246.zh-Hant:
<voice 06037_00000246><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>要活下去啊……世界樹……！
我的力量……全部都給你。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

247.en: <voice 06345_00000247><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>Spirit of young leaves...<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
247.ja: <voice 06345_00000247><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「若葉の精霊……。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
247.ko: <voice 06345_00000247><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 새싹의 정령…….<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
247.zh-Hans: <voice 06345_00000247><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>新叶精灵……<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
247.zh-Hant: <voice 06345_00000247><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>新葉精靈……<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

248.en: <voice 06444_00000248><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>Don't worry... As long as the World Tree exists, I won't die.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
248.ja:
<voice 06444_00000248><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「心配するな……　世界樹があるかぎり
　オリは　死なないのダワ。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
248.ko:
<voice 06444_00000248><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 걱정 마라…… 세계수가 있는 한
　난 죽지 않는다.<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
248.zh-Hans:
<voice 06444_00000248><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>别担心……只要世界树还在，
我就不可能会死。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
248.zh-Hant:
<voice 06444_00000248><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>別擔心……只要世界樹還存在，
我就不可能會死。<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

249.en:
<voice 07076_00000249><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>Let's return to the Garden. We have to tell Professor Izuyanoi
everything that's happened here!!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
249.ja:
<voice 07076_00000249><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「学びの庭へ　戻ろう。
　ここで起こったことを
　イズヤノイ先生に　伝えるんだ！！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
249.ko:
<voice 07076_00000249><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 배움의 뜰로 돌아가자.
　이곳에서 일어난 일을
　이즈야노이 선생님께 알려야 해!!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
249.zh-Hans:
<voice 07076_00000249><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>回学识之庭吧，
把在这里发生的事情
告诉泉屋野依老师！！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
249.zh-Hant:
<voice 07076_00000249><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>回去學識之庭吧，
把在這裡發生的事情
告訴泉屋野依老師！！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

250.en: <voice 00083_00000250><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>We've been waiting for you. This way, please.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
250.ja:
<voice 00083_00000250><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「お待ちしておりました。
　さあ　こちらへ。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
250.ko:
<voice 00083_00000250><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 기다리고 있었습니다.
　자, 이쪽으로 오시죠.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
250.zh-Hans:
<voice 00083_00000250><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>等你很久了。
来，这边请。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
250.zh-Hant:
<voice 00083_00000250><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>等你很久了。
來，這邊請。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

251.en: <voice 00670_00000251><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Pardon the intrusion. I've brought the last one.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
251.ja:
<voice 00670_00000251><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「失礼いたします。
　<pc>さんを　お連れしました。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
251.ko:
<voice 00670_00000251><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 실례하겠습니다.
　<pc> 씨를 데려왔습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
251.zh-Hans:
<voice 00670_00000251><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>打扰了，
我把<pc>带过来了。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
251.zh-Hant:
<voice 00670_00000251><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>打擾了，
我把<pc>帶過來了。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

252.en: <voice 00990_00000252><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>, come over here.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
252.ja: <voice 00990_00000252><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「<pc>　もっと　こちらへ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
252.ko: <voice 00990_00000252><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 이리 가까이 오세요.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
252.zh-Hans: <voice 00990_00000252><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>，你上前来。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
252.zh-Hant: <voice 00990_00000252><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>，你上前來。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

253.en:
<voice 01410_00000253><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>I'm sorry to hear about Master Kou
and the spirit of young leaves.
I have heard the whole story from the rustling of the wind and have
made appropriate provisions.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
253.ja:
<voice 01410_00000253><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「師コウと　若葉の精霊のことは　残念でした。
　私も　風たちの　ざわめきから話を聞き
　そなえては　いたのですが……。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
253.ko:
<voice 01410_00000253><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 스승 코우와 새싹의 정령 일은 유감입니다.
　저도 술렁이는 바람들로부터
　이야기를 듣고 대비했습니다만…….<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
253.zh-Hans:
<voice 01410_00000253><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>导师钢和新叶精灵的事真是遗憾。
从风儿们的低语中听到此事以后，
我也有所准备，但是……<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
253.zh-Hant:
<voice 01410_00000253><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>導師鋼和新葉精靈的事真是遺憾。
從風兒們的低語中聽到此事以後，
我也有所準備，但是……<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

254.en: <voice 01490_00000254><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>The great light that saved you from the monsters came from  Lendersia, the center of the world.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
254.ja:
<voice 01490_00000254><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「魔瘴から　そなたたちを救った
　あの大いなる光は　世界の中心
　レンダーシアより　放たれました。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
254.ko:
<voice 01490_00000254><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 마장으로부터 그대들을 지킨
　그 위대한 빛은 세계의 중심
　렌더시아에서 뿜어져 나온 것입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
254.zh-Hans:
<voice 01490_00000254><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>把你们从魔瘴中救出来的那片光，
是从世界的中心
冷达西亚射出来的。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
254.zh-Hant:
<voice 01490_00000254><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>把你們從魔瘴中救出來的
那道偉大之光，是從世界的中心
冷達西亞射出來的。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26969.en:
<voice 01580_00026969><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>That light is the sign that the
legendary Hero has awakened some
where in the land of Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26969.ja:
<voice 01580_00026969><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「あの光こそ　伝説の勇者が覚醒した証。
　レンダーシアの地の　いずこかに
　勇者が現れたことを　示すものです。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26969.ko:
<voice 01580_00026969><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그 빛은 전설의 용사가 각성했다는 증거.
　렌더시아 땅 어딘가에
　용사가 나타났다는 것을 뜻합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26969.zh-Hans:
<voice 01580_00026969><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>那道光是传说中的勇者觉醒的证明。
它的出现就表示冷达西亚的某处
有勇者出现了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26969.zh-Hant:
<voice 01580_00026969><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>那道光是傳說中的勇者覺醒的證明。
它的出現就表示冷達西亞的某處
有勇者出現了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26970.en:
<voice 01640_00026970><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>...The Hero is someone who is born into
the world in a time of great chaos. But
a great darkness accompanies them..<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26970.ja:
<voice 01640_00026970><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「……そして　勇者とは　混沌の世に
　生まれてくる者。あの光は　同時に
　大いなる闇の誕生を　示してもいるのです。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26970.ko:
<voice 01640_00026970><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: ……그리고 용사란 혼란한 세상에
　나타나는 존재. 그 빛은 거대한 어둠이
　탄생했다는 뜻이기도 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26970.zh-Hans:
<voice 01640_00026970><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>……然而，混沌之世
才会诞生勇者。那道光同时也代表着
一片庞大黑暗的诞生。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26970.zh-Hant:
<voice 01640_00026970><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>……然而，混沌之世
才會誕生勇者。那道光同時也代表著
有一片龐大黑暗誕生了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001474.en: <voice 01700_19001474><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Asanagi, Kyusuke, and <pc>.  You all faced the demon miasma without fear, didn't you?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001474.ja:
<voice 01700_19001474><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「アサナギ　キュウスケ　そして　<pc>。
　お前たちは　あの魔瘴を前にしても
　恐れずに　立ち向かいましたね。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001474.ko:
<voice 01700_19001474><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 아사나기, 큐스케, 그리고 <pc>.
　그대들은 그 마장 앞에서도
　용감하게 맞섰습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001474.zh-Hans:
<voice 01700_19001474><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>朝薙，久助，以及<pc>。
即使面对魔瘴，
你们也没有畏惧退缩。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001474.zh-Hant:
<voice 01700_19001474><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>麻薙、久助，以及<pc>。
即使面對魔瘴，
你們也沒有畏懼退縮。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

256.en:
<voice 01790_00000256><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Your great courage and fearlessness
will be needed in the days to come.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
256.ja:
<voice 01790_00000256><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「何ものをも恐れぬ　その偉大な勇気は
　これからの世に　必要とされることでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
256.ko:
<voice 01790_00000256><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그 무엇도 두려워하지 않는
　그 위대한 용기가 앞으로 이 세상에
　반드시 필요해질 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
256.zh-Hans:
<voice 01790_00000256><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>那样天不怕地不怕的伟大勇气，
一定是未来的世界需要的。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
256.zh-Hant:
<voice 01790_00000256><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>那樣天不怕地不怕的偉大勇氣，
一定是未來的世界需要的。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001475.en:
<voice 01880_19001475><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>, Asanagi and Kyusuke you have all passed the trials. You must
now set off on your journeys.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001475.ja:
<voice 01880_19001475><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「力の試練に合格した　<pc>だけではなく
　特別に　アサナギとキュウスケも合格とします。
　お前たちも　学びの庭を出て　旅立ちなさい。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001475.ko:
<voice 01880_19001475><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 힘의 시련을 통과한 <pc>뿐만 아니라
　아사나기와 큐스케도 특별히 합격시키겠습니다.
　그대들도 배움의 뜰을 벗어나 여행을 하십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001475.zh-Hans:
<voice 01880_19001475><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>不光是通过了力量试炼的<pc>，
朝薙和久助也特别给予合格。
你们也离开学识之庭踏上旅途吧。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001475.zh-Hant:
<voice 01880_19001475><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>不光是通過了力量考驗的<pc>，
麻薙和久助也特別給予合格。
你們也離開學識之庭踏上旅途吧。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

257.ja: <voice 01985_00000257><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>「えええええええっ！？<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

258.en: <voice 02040_00000258><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Why is it that you are so surprised, Kyusuke.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
258.ja: <voice 02040_00000258><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「何を　おどろいているのです　キュウスケ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
258.ko: <voice 02040_00000258><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 왜 그리 놀라는 거죠, 큐스케?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
258.zh-Hans: <voice 02040_00000258><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>久助，你在惊讶什么？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
258.zh-Hant: <voice 02040_00000258><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>久助，你在驚訝什麼？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

259.en: <voice 02050_00000259><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>You and Asanagi are both more than up to the task.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
259.ja:
<voice 02050_00000259><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「そなたにも　アサナギにも　そのチカラは
　充分に　そなわっているのですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
259.ko:
<voice 02050_00000259><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그대와 아사나기에게도 그만한 힘이
　충분히 갖춰져 있습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
259.zh-Hans:
<voice 02050_00000259><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>不管是你还是朝薙，
都拥有足够的实力。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
259.zh-Hant:
<voice 02050_00000259><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>不管是你還是麻薙，
都擁有足夠的實力。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

260.en: <voice 02160_00000260><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Besides, Kyusuke, you already made up your mind when you heard Master Kou's words, didn't you?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
260.ja:
<voice 02160_00000260><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「それに　キュウスケ。
　そなたも　師コウの言葉で
　心を決めたのでしょう？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
260.ko:
<voice 02160_00000260><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그리고, 큐스케.
　그대도 스승 코우의 말을 듣고
　결심을 굳히지 않았던가요?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
260.zh-Hans:
<voice 02160_00000260><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>再说，久助，
你也是因为导师钢的一番话，
而下定决心了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
260.zh-Hant:
<voice 02160_00000260><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>再說，久助，
你也是因為導師鋼的一番話，
而下定決心了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

262.en: <voice 02500_00000262><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>The Hero's Awakening... And the Great Darkness...<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
262.ja: <voice 02500_00000262><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「勇者の覚醒……　そして　大いなる闇……。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
262.ko: <voice 02500_00000262><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 용사의 각성……그리고 거대한 어둠…….<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
262.zh-Hans: <voice 02500_00000262><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>勇者的觉醒……以及庞大黑暗……<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
262.zh-Hant: <voice 02500_00000262><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>勇者的覺醒……以及龐大黑暗……<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

263.en:
<voice 02544_00000263><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>There's something going on in the
world. I can't afford to dwell on little
things like competing against <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
263.ja:
<voice 02544_00000263><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「世界に　何かが起きているんだ。
　<pc>との　勝負なんて
　小さなことに　こだわってる場合じゃない。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
263.ko:
<voice 02544_00000263><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 이 세계에 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는 거야.
　{pc}|hpp(과,와)의 승부 같은
　사소한 일에 집착할 때가 아니겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
263.zh-Hans:
<voice 02544_00000263><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>世界上一定发生了什么事。
现在不是计较和<pc>的胜负
这种小事的时候。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
263.zh-Hant:
<voice 02544_00000263><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>世界上一定發生了什麼事。
現在不是計較和<pc>的勝負
這種小事的時候。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

264.en: <voice 02750_00000264><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Hmph. Quit teasing, Asanagi!<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
264.ja: <voice 02750_00000264><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「アサナギ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

265.en:
<voice 02780_00000265><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>You have great knowledge. You must travel and cultivate it. Then, you
will fulfill <pc>'s dying wish.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
265.ja:
<voice 02780_00000265><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「そなたには　すぐれた英知がある。
　旅をして　そのチカラを育てなさい。
　そして　<pc>の遺志を　継ぐのです。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
265.ko:
<voice 02780_00000265><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그대에게는 뛰어난 지혜가 있습니다.
　여행을 하며 그 힘을 키우세요.
　그리고 <pc>의 유지를 잇는 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
265.zh-Hans:
<voice 02780_00000265><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>你有着卓越的才智。
踏上旅途去发展你的才华，
并继承<pc>的遗志吧。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
265.zh-Hant:
<voice 02780_00000265><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>你有著卓越的才智。
你就踏上旅途去發展你的才華，
並繼承<pc>的遺志吧。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

266.en: <voice 02970_00000266><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001><pc>'s... Dying wish? What do you mean......<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
266.ja:
<voice 02970_00000266><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「<pc>の……遺志？
　それは　いったい…………<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
266.ko:
<voice 02970_00000266><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: <pc>의…… 유지?
　그게 무슨…………<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
266.zh-Hans:
<voice 02970_00000266><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001><pc>的……遗志？
那是指…………？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
266.zh-Hant:
<voice 02970_00000266><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001><pc>的……遺志？
那是指…………？<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

267.en:
<voice 03050_00000267><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Now, let's begin the rite of maturity.
Place your Adventure Log before you.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
267.ja:
<voice 03050_00000267><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「それでは　巣立ちの儀を　始めましょう。
　さあ　冒険の書を　前に。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
267.ko:
<voice 03050_00000267><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그럼 졸업 의식을 시작하죠.
　자, 모험의 서를 앞으로.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
267.zh-Hans:
<voice 03050_00000267><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>那么，我们就开始毕业仪式吧。
来，拿出你们的冒险之书。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
267.zh-Hant:
<voice 03050_00000267><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>那麼，我們就開始畢業儀式吧。
來，拿出你們的冒險之書。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

268.en: <voice 03278_00000268><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>O great god of wind, o nurturing Yggdrasil!<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
268.ja:
<voice 03278_00000268><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「大いなる風の神よ。
　そして　はぐくみの世界樹よ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
268.ko:
<voice 03278_00000268><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 위대한 바람의 신이시여.
　그리고 우리를 품어 주시는 세계수여.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
268.zh-Hans:
<voice 03278_00000268><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>伟大的风神，
以及孕育着我们的世界树啊。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
268.zh-Hant:
<voice 03278_00000268><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>偉大的風神，
以及孕育著我們的世界樹啊。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

269.en: <voice 03308_00000269><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Grant upon these three the Mark of Adulthood.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
269.ja:
<voice 03308_00000269><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「一人前のチカラを持てし　この者たちに
　その証を　与えたまえ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
269.ko:
<voice 03308_00000269><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 어엿한 힘을 갖춘 이자들에게
　그 증표를 내리소서.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
269.zh-Hans:
<voice 03308_00000269><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>请将证明赐予
能够独当一面的他们吧。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
269.zh-Hant:
<voice 03308_00000269><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>請將證明賜予
能夠獨當一面的他們吧。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

270.en: <voice 03570_00000270><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>The Mark of Adulthood...<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
270.ja: <voice 03570_00000270><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>「一人前の証だ……。<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
270.ko: <voice 03570_00000270><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>: 모험가의 증표야…….<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
270.zh-Hans: <voice 03570_00000270><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>这是合格者的证明……<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
270.zh-Hant: <voice 03570_00000270><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>是合格者之證……<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

271.en:
<voice 03630_00000271><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>With this, you'll be granted an audience
with the rulers of foreign lands.
Do not bring shame to that Mark!<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
271.ja:
<voice 03630_00000271><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「それを持てば　異国の王との謁見も
　許されることでしょう。その証に　恥じぬよう
　正しき行動を　心がけるのですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
271.ko:
<voice 03630_00000271><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그걸 지니고 있으면 이국의 왕도
　알현할 수 있습니다. 증표에 부끄럽지 않도록
　항상 올바른 행동을 유념하세요.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
271.zh-Hans:
<voice 03630_00000271><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>有了这个，就连他国的国王
也会谒见你们。你们今后一定要注意自己的言行，
别辜负了这个合格者的证明。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
271.zh-Hant:
<voice 03630_00000271><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>有了這個，就連他國的國王
也會謁見你們。你們今後一定要注意自己的言行，
別辜負了這個合格者之證。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

272.en:
<voice 03770_00000272><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Now, go forth. You are the pride of
this village, our young leaves.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
272.ja:
<voice 03770_00000272><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「さあ　行きなさい。
　この学問の村が誇る　若葉たちよ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
272.ko:
<voice 03770_00000272><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 자, 가십시오.
　학문의 마을의 자랑스러운 새싹들이여.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
272.zh-Hans:
<voice 03770_00000272><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>好了，你们出发吧，
学问之村引以为傲的新叶们。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
272.zh-Hant:
<voice 03770_00000272><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>好了，你們出發吧，
學問之村引以為傲的新葉們。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

273.en: <voice 03840_00000273><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>May Yggdrasil guard your future!<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
273.ja:
<voice 03840_00000273><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「そなたらの未来に　世界樹と
　風の守りが　あらんことを！<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
273.ko:
<voice 03840_00000273><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그대들의 앞날에 세계수와
　바람의 가호가 있기를!<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
273.zh-Hans:
<voice 03840_00000273><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>愿世界树与风
守护你们的未来！<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
273.zh-Hant:
<voice 03840_00000273><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>願世界樹與風
守護你們的未來！<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

274.en: <voice 03960_00000274><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>I'm going to become worthy of Ucharin!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
274.ja:
<voice 03960_00000274><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>「オレは　ユーチャーリンに
　ふさわしい男になってみせるぜ！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
274.ko:
<voice 03960_00000274><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>: 난 유차린에게
　걸맞은 남자가 되겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
274.zh-Hans:
<voice 03960_00000274><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>我要成为配得上
夕茶铃的男人！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
274.zh-Hant:
<voice 03960_00000274><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>我要成為配得上
夕茶鈴的男人！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

275.en: <voice 04020_00000275><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>I'm setting off! Adios!!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
275.ja:
<voice 04020_00000275><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>「じゃあな　お先にっ！
　アディオース！！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
275.ko:
<voice 04020_00000275><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>: 그럼 먼저 간다!
　아디오스!!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
275.zh-Hans:
<voice 04020_00000275><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>那我先走了！
再会！！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
275.zh-Hant:
<voice 04020_00000275><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>那我先走了！
再會！！<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

276.en:
<voice 04198_00000276><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>I'm going, too. I have to figure out
what's going on in the world.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
276.ja:
<voice 04198_00000276><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「ボクも　行くよ。
　世界に起きていることを　解き明かすために。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
276.ko:
<voice 04198_00000276><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 나도 가겠어.
　이 세계에서 일어나는 일을 밝혀내기 위해.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
276.zh-Hans:
<voice 04198_00000276><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>我也走了。
我一定要弄清世界上发生了什么事。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
276.zh-Hant:
<voice 04198_00000276><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>我也走了。
我一定要弄清世界上發生了什麼事。<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

277.en:
<voice 04268_00000277><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>And I need to learn the truth behind
what Lady Himea said earlier!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
277.ja:
<voice 04268_00000277><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「そして　さっき　ヒメア様がおっしゃった
　言葉の真意を　知るんだ！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
277.ko:
<voice 04268_00000277><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 그리고 조금 전에 히메아 님께서 하신
　말씀의 진의를 알아내겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
277.zh-Hans:
<voice 04268_00000277><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>还有，我要去弄清楚卑弥亚大人刚才
说的话是什么意思！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
277.zh-Hant:
<voice 04268_00000277><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>還有，我要去弄清楚卑彌亞大人剛才
所說的話是什麼意思！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

278.en: <voice 04378_00000278><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>You take care, too. Somewhere, someday...I'll see you again!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
278.ja:
<voice 04378_00000278><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>「キミも　元気で。
　また　いつか……　どこかで会おう！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
278.ko:
<voice 04378_00000278><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>: 너도 잘 지내라.
　언젠가…… 어디선가 또 만나자!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
278.zh-Hans:
<voice 04378_00000278><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>你也多保重。
我们就……后会有期了！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>
278.zh-Hant:
<voice 04378_00000278><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>你也多保重。
我們就……後會有期了！<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

279.en: <voice 04685_00000279><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>I finally understand, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
279.ja:
<voice 04685_00000279><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「<pc>
　ようやく　わかりましたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
279.ko:
<voice 04685_00000279><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: <pc>
　이제야 알겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
279.zh-Hans:
<voice 04685_00000279><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>，
我终于知道了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
279.zh-Hant:
<voice 04685_00000279><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>，
我終於知道了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

280.en:
<voice 04795_00000280><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>How could <pc>, who supposedly died after failing to revive an
ancient spell, still be alive...?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
280.ja:
<voice 04795_00000280><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「古代呪文の復活に失敗し
　死んだはずの　<pc>が
　なぜ　こうして生きているのか……。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
280.ko:
<voice 04795_00000280><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 고대 주문의 부활에 실패해
　죽을 운명이었던 {pc}|hpp(이,가)
　어떻게 이렇게 살아 있는지를…….<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
280.zh-Hans:
<voice 04795_00000280><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>试图让古代咒文复活失败后
本应死去，
但为何现在你还活着……？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
280.zh-Hant:
<voice 04795_00000280><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>試圖讓古代咒文復活失敗後
已經死了，
但為何現在你還活著呢……？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

281.en: <voice 04945_00000281><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>This is your true appearance, isn't it?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
281.ja: <voice 04945_00000281><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「そなたの本当の姿は　こちらですね。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
281.ko: <voice 04945_00000281><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그대의 진짜 모습은 이쪽이죠?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
281.zh-Hans: <voice 04945_00000281><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>这才是你本来的面貌啊。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
281.zh-Hant: <voice 04945_00000281><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>這才是你本來的面貌啊。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

282.en:
<voice 04995_00000282><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Your soul was rescued and this body was given to you so that you
can fulfill a great mission, right?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
282.ja:
<voice 04995_00000282><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「大いなる使命を果たすために　魂を救われ
　その身体を　与えられたのでしょう？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
282.ko:
<voice 04995_00000282><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 위대한 사명을 이룰 수 있도록
　영혼을 구원받아 그 몸에 들어간 거지요?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
282.zh-Hans:
<voice 04995_00000282><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>你的灵魂得到拯救，被赋予这个躯体，
都是为了完成重大的使命对吧？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
282.zh-Hant:
<voice 04995_00000282><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>你的靈魂得到拯救，被賦予這個軀體，
都是為了完成重大的使命吧？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

284.en:
<voice 05125_00000284><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>You must now travel the world and
hone your skills. Use your  power for the benefit of everyone.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
284.ja:
<voice 05125_00000284><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「今は　世界をめぐり　修練を積みなさい。
　そのチカラを　世界の人々のために
　役立てるのです。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
284.ko:
<voice 05125_00000284><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 지금은 세상을 여행하며 수련을 쌓으세요.
　그 힘을 이 세계의 사람들을 위해
　사용하세요.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
284.zh-Hans:
<voice 05125_00000284><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>从现在起，你去环游世界不断修行吧，
你要用你的力量为世上的人们
做出贡献。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
284.zh-Hant:
<voice 05125_00000284><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>從現在起，你去環遊世界不斷修行吧，
你要用你的力量為世上的人們
做出貢獻。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

285.en:
<voice 05195_00000285><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Collect the Key Emblems that are
awarded to heroes in each country.
If you do, a path shall surely open.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
285.ja:
<voice 05195_00000285><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「そして　各国の英雄に与えられる勲章
　キーエンブレムを　集めなさい。
　さすれば　必ず　道が開けることでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
285.ko:
<voice 05195_00000285><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그리고 각국의 영웅들에게 주어지는 훈장
　키 엠블럼을 모으세요.
　그러면 반드시 길이 열릴 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
285.zh-Hans:
<voice 05195_00000285><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>然后你要去收集赐予
各国英雄的勋章，也就是键徽，
这样必定会开拓出一条路。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
285.zh-Hant:
<voice 05195_00000285><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>然後你要去收集賜予
各國英雄的勳章，也就是鑰徽，
這樣就必定會開拓出一條路來的。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001429.en:
<voice 05776_19001429><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>No matter how I look at you, you
look just like <pc>, but...  You're different on the inside, aren't you...?<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001429.ja:
<voice 05776_19001429><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>「こうして見ると　どこから見ても
　<pc>なのに
　中身は　ちがうんですね……。<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001429.ko:
<voice 05776_19001429><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>: 이렇게 보면 아무리 보아도
　{pc}|hpp(으로,로)밖에 안 보이는데
　영혼은 다른 사람이라니…….<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001429.zh-Hans:
<voice 05776_19001429><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>从外表上无论怎么看
都是<pc>呢，
但灵魂却是不一样的啊……<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001429.zh-Hant:
<voice 05776_19001429><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>從外表上無論怎麼看
都是<pc>呢，
但靈魂卻是不一樣的啊……<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>

293.en: <voice 05805_00000293><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>The owner of that body was dear to us...<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
293.ja: <voice 05805_00000293><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「その身体の持ち主は　エルフの宝でした。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
293.ko: <voice 05805_00000293><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그 몸의 주인은 엘프의 보물이었습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
293.zh-Hans: <voice 05805_00000293><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>这身体的主人，是埃尔夫的宝物。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
293.zh-Hant: <voice 05805_00000293><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>這身體的主人，是艾爾芙的寶物。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

294.en:
<voice 05842_00000294><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Please never forget that you are
the one who was supposed to lead
and guide us.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
294.ja:
<voice 05842_00000294><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「我らの先頭に立ち　導いてくれるはずの 
　存在だったということを
　ゆめゆめ　忘れずにいてください。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
294.ko:
<voice 05842_00000294><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 우리의 선두에 서서
　우리를 이끌어 줄 존재였다는 것을
　절대 잊지 마세요.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
294.zh-Hans:
<voice 05842_00000294><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>请千万别忘记，
你应该要站在我们的前面
引导我们。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
294.zh-Hant:
<voice 05842_00000294><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>請千萬別忘記，
你應該要站在我們的前面
引導我們。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

295.en: <voice 05995_00000295><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>I pray that you will succeed in your quest.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
295.ja:
<voice 05995_00000295><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「そなたが　立派に使命を果たせるよう
　祈っていますよ。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
295.ko:
<voice 05995_00000295><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그대가 훌륭히 사명을 다하기를
　기도하겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
295.zh-Hans:
<voice 05995_00000295><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>我祈祷你能顺利完成
使命。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
295.zh-Hant:
<voice 05995_00000295><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>我祈禱你能順利完成
使命。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

296.en:
<voice 06146_00000296><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>I've told the people in the Garden of
Learning that you and the others
have completed their rite of maturity.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
296.ja:
<voice 06146_00000296><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんたちが　巣立ちの儀を
　終えたことは　学びの庭の人たちに伝えました。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
296.ko:
<voice 06146_00000296><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨와 친구분들이 졸업 의식을
　마친 것을 배움의 뜰 사람들에게도 전했습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
296.zh-Hans:
<voice 06146_00000296><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>我已经告诉学识之庭的人，
说<pc>等人完成独立仪式了。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
296.zh-Hant:
<voice 06146_00000296><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>我已經告訴學識之庭的人，
說<pc>等人完成獨立儀式了。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000630.en:
<voice 06177_19000630><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Come now, it's time to begin your
journey. First, head west to Azlan, the
city of wind, and find a train station.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000630.ja:
<voice 06177_19000630><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「さあ　旅立ちの時です。
　まずは　西へ向かい
　風の町アズランを　目指すといいでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000630.ko:
<voice 06177_19000630><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 자, 여행을 떠날 때입니다.
　우선 서쪽으로 향해서
　바람의 마을 아즐란을 찾아가세요.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000630.zh-Hans:
<voice 06177_19000630><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>踏上旅途的时刻来临了。
先向西前进，
前往风城安须岚吧。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000630.zh-Hant:
<voice 06177_19000630><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>踏上旅途的時刻來臨了。
先向西前進，
前往風城安須嵐吧。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

298.en: <voice 06275_00000298><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Please, take care.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
298.ja: <voice 06275_00000298><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「それでは　どうか　お気をつけて。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
298.ko: <voice 06275_00000298><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 그럼 부디 조심하시길.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
298.zh-Hans: <voice 06275_00000298><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>那就先这样，请小心。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
298.zh-Hant: <voice 06275_00000298><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>那就先這樣，請小心。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

300.en: <voice 00422_00000300><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>See ya la～～ta!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
300.ja: <voice 00422_00000300><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>「またな～～ダワ！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
300.ko: <voice 00422_00000300><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>: 또 보자~~!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
300.zh-Hans: <voice 00422_00000300><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>再见了～～耶！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
300.zh-Hant: <voice 00422_00000300><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>再見囉～～耶！！<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9200.en:
<voice 00083_00009200><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>It's been a while, hasn't it,
<pc>? Please come this way.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9200.ja:
<voice 00083_00009200><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「おひさしぶりですね　<pc>さん。
　さあ　こちらへ。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9200.ko:
<voice 00083_00009200><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 오랜만이군요, <pc> 씨.
　자, 이쪽으로 오세요.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9200.zh-Hans:
<voice 00083_00009200><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001><pc>，好久不见。
来，这边请。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9200.zh-Hant:
<voice 00083_00009200><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>好久不見了，<pc>。
來，這邊請。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9201.en: <voice 00491_00009201><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Pardon the intrusion. I've brought the last one.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9201.ja:
<voice 00491_00009201><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「失礼いたします。
　<pc>さんを　お連れしました。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9201.ko:
<voice 00491_00009201><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 실례하겠습니다.
　<pc> 씨를 데려왔습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9201.zh-Hans:
<voice 00491_00009201><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>打扰了。
我把<pc>带过来了。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9201.zh-Hant:
<voice 00491_00009201><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>打擾了。
我把<pc>帶過來了。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9202.ja: <voice 00630_00009202><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「<pc>　こちらへ　おいでなさい。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9202.ko: <voice 00630_00009202><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 이리 오세요.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9202.zh-Hans: <voice 00630_00009202><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>，请到这边来。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9202.zh-Hant: <voice 00630_00009202><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>，到這邊來。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9203.en: <voice 00746_00009203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>I've heard about you from the wind... You've done well in  overcoming many hardships.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9203.ja:
<voice 00746_00009203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「風たちから　聞いてはいましたが……
　多くの苦難を乗り越え
　よく　がんばりましたね。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9203.ko:
<voice 00746_00009203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 바람들에게 듣기는 했지만……
　수많은 고난을 뛰어넘으며
　열심히 노력했더군요.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9203.zh-Hans:
<voice 00746_00009203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>我已经通过风得知了……
克服了那么多的困难，
真是辛苦你了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9203.zh-Hant:
<voice 00746_00009203><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>風都已經告訴我了……
你克服那麼多的困難，
真是辛苦你了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9204.en:
<voice 00805_00009204><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>. Do you remember what I said to you when I gave
you your Mark of Adulthood?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9204.ja:
<voice 00805_00009204><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「<pc>。
　そなたに　一人前の証を　授けたとき
　私が言った言葉を　覚えていますか？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9204.ko:
<voice 00805_00009204><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　그대에게 모험가의 증표를 건네며
　제가 했던 말을 기억하나요?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9204.zh-Hans:
<voice 00805_00009204><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>，
你还记得将合格者的证明赠予你时，
我所说的话吗？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9204.zh-Hant:
<voice 00805_00009204><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>，
你還記得授予你合格者之證時，
我所說的話嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9205.en: <voice 00835_00009205><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>The owner of that body  was a treasure to the elves.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9205.ja:
<voice 00835_00009205><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「その身体の持ち主は　エルフの宝でした。
　先頭に立ち　我らを導いてくれるはずの
　大切な存在だった……。そう言いましたね？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9205.ko:
<voice 00835_00009205><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그 몸의 주인은 엘프의 보물이었습니다.
　선두에 서서 우리를 이끌어 줄
　소중한 존재였다……. 그렇게 말했죠?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9205.zh-Hans:
<voice 00835_00009205><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>这副身躯的主人曾经是我们埃尔夫的珍宝，
是一个本应该指引我族前进的人……
我曾经这样说过吧？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9205.zh-Hant:
<voice 00835_00009205><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>這副身軀的主人曾是艾爾芙的寶物。
他本來是一位
應該帶領我族前進的人……我曾經這樣說過吧？<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9206.en:
<voice 00895_00009206><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>You have successfully fulfilled the
Elf <pc>'s mission on their behalf.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9206.ja:
<voice 00895_00009206><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「そなたは　エルフの　<pc>に代わり
　課せられた使命を　見事　果たしました。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9206.ko:
<voice 00895_00009206><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그대는 엘프 {pc}|hpp(을,를) 대신해서
　주어진 사명을 훌륭하게 수행했어요.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9206.zh-Hans:
<voice 00895_00009206><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>你代替埃尔夫的<pc>
出色地完成了使命。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9206.zh-Hant:
<voice 00895_00009206><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>你替艾爾芙的<pc>
漂亮地完成了使命。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9207.en:
<voice 00925_00009207><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Because of you, the five continentsー
including our own continent of Eltonaーhave been saved.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9207.ja:
<voice 00925_00009207><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「そなたのおかげで　このエルトナ大陸を含む
　５つの大陸が　救われたのです。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9207.ko:
<voice 00925_00009207><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 그대 덕분에 이 엘토나 대륙을 비롯한
　5개의 대륙이 구원받았죠.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9207.zh-Hans:
<voice 00925_00009207><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>多亏了你，包括这埃尔托纳大陆
在内的五大陆都得救了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9207.zh-Hant:
<voice 00925_00009207><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>多虧了你，包括這艾爾托納大陸在內
５個大陸都得救了。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9208.en:
<voice 01005_00009208><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>. Now you must broaden your horizons
and aim for even greater heights
until a new adventure begins.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9208.ja:
<voice 01005_00009208><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。
　見聞を広め　さらなる高みを目指しなさい。
　いずれ　新たな冒険が始まる　その時まで。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9208.ko:
<voice 01005_00009208><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　견문을 넓히고 더 높은 경지에 오르세요.
　언젠가 새로운 모험이 시작될 그날까지.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9208.zh-Hans:
<voice 01005_00009208><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>啊。
开阔你的视野，向更高的目标前进吧。
总有一天你会踏上新的冒险旅程。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9208.zh-Hant:
<voice 01005_00009208><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
拓廣你的視野，向更高的目標前進吧。
總有一天你會踏上新的冒險旅程。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9209.en: <voice 01035_00009209><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>I'll be here, praying for  safety on your journey.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9209.ja:
<voice 01035_00009209><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>「私は　ずっと　ここで
　そなたの旅の安全を　祈っています。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9209.ko:
<voice 01035_00009209><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>: 저는 계속 이곳에서
　그대가 안전하게 여행하길 기도하겠어요.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9209.zh-Hans:
<voice 01035_00009209><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>我会一直在这里
祈祷你旅途平安的。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9209.zh-Hant:
<voice 01035_00009209><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>我會一直在這裡
祈禱你旅途平安。<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9210.ja: <voice 01192_00009210><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>「では　お気をつけて。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9210.ko: <voice 01192_00009210><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>: 그럼 조심해서 가세요.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9210.zh-Hans: <voice 01192_00009210><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>那么，请多保重。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9210.zh-Hant: <voice 01192_00009210><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>那麼，請多保重。<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>
